en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
ny: "Tikufuna zinthu ziwiri zomwe zili ndi masiku awiri amadziwa kuti ndi osauka omwe amakonda kusauka," anayankhula.

en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
ny: Daktari Ehud Ur, wachitatu wa daktari ku Dalhousie University mu Halifax, Nova Scotia ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la kugwiritsa ntchito za maphunziro ndi zofunika za Canadian Diabetes Association anapempha kuti chitukuko chilichonse ndi chakumalawi.

en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ny: Ngati ena amene ndi ma expert, iye ndi wokhulupirika kuti diabetes ikhoza kuchulukidwa, akukhulupirira kuti zimenezi sizikuyenera kwa anthu amene ali ndi diabetes ya Type 1.

en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ny: Pa Lolemba, Sara Danius, wosewera wamkulu wa Komiti ya Nobel ya Lekhachikulu pa Swedish Academy, wachititsa ntchito kuchokera pa phindu la radio pa Sveriges Radio mu Sweden, komitiyo, yomwe sanathe kumfikira Bob Dylan mochedwa pa kusintha mawu a Nobel Prize ya Lekhachikulu ya 2016, yadzuka zinyengo zake kuti ikamfikira.

en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
ny: Danius anati, "Tsiku lino tikuchita zochita. Ndimafonera ndi kusankha mapepala kwa wakumudzi wake wokondedwa ndipo ndafika ndi mawu a chikondi. Pano, izi zimakhala zopatsa chifukwa chake."

en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
ny: Pachipembedzo, CEO wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, anati kuti kompani yake yatsika pamene dzina lake la mlendo silikuyimba kuchokera m'magazi ake mu gareji.

en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
ny: Anamanga dzina la WiFi door bell, anati.

en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
ny: Siminoff anati kuti zinthu zidzatha ndi kugwiritsa ntchito atsogoleri a mwayi ake pa nthawi ya 2013 m'mbuyo ya mwayi wa Shark Tank pamene mpanjira ya mwayiyo panalowa kugwiritsa ntchito kugwiritsa ntchito.

en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
ny: M'nyengo ya 2017, Siminoff anapitilira pa mawu a televishoni ya kugulitsa QVC.

en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
ny: Ring yalembedwa ndi chitsekedwe chokhala ndi kampeni yamphamvu yomwe ikuchitira ntchito, ADT Corporation.

en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
ny: Pali pamtunda wamkulu wokhala ndi chikondi cha Ebola, koma mpaka tsopano, palibe madalitso amene adalakwitsa kuti adzikhala wosinthika kwa kukweza chilengedwe chokhala.

en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
ny: Mu PALM trial, ZMapp anapereka chikondi, kusintha kuti anthu a science anatumiza chikondi chake ndi kuyambira zina zitatu za maphunziro.

en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ny: USA Gymnastics ikhulupirira Mfuko wa Olimpiki wa M'malawi wa United States ndi kukhulupirira kwambiri kwa mtsogoleri wa Olimpiki kuti aphunzire mlingo wabwino kwa anthu onse a mpira wa m'malawi.

en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
ny: Tidzakondwera ndi kusintha kwa USOC kuti masungwi athu ndi mpira wawo, ndi mpira wawo, mungathe kusintha m'malo moti tisachite kusintha.

en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
ny: USA Gymnastics ikhulupirira chitentha chachikulu chomwe chingathe kusintha ngati chikumbumtima chomwe chilipo chifukwa cha anthu amene anaphunziridwa ndi Larry Nassar anachita kugwiritsa ntchito chifukwa cha chilungamo ndipo ikhulupirira zonse zomwe zingachitike.

en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ny: USA Gymnastics ndi USOC ali ndi chitukuko chimodzi - kuchita mpira wa gymnastics, ndi zina, monga chilungamo chachikulu kuti anthu akhale ndi mwayi wawo kuwafunsa mpira wawo mu dziko la chilungamo, chilungamo ndi chilungamo.

en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ny: Pamaso pa 1960s, Brzezinski anachita ntchito ndi John F. Kennedy ngati mtsogoleri wake ndipo pano ndi mtsogoleri wa Lyndon B. Johnson.

en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ny: Pamaso pa zaka za 1976, anamuyang'ana Carter pa zinthu zokwanira za dziko lalikulu, ndipo anamuthandiza kuti akhale Wamuyaya wa Zokwanira za Dziko (NSA) kuyambira 1977 mpaka 1981, pamene anamuyang'ana Henry Kissinger.

en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ny: Ngakhale kuti ndi NSA, anamuthandiza Carter m'kugwiritsa ntchito ndi mphamvu zokhazikika pamene amalimbikitsa zinthu zokhazikika pa dziko lonse, monga zomwe zinali ku Camp David Accords, 1978; kugwiritsa ntchito zokhazikika za US-China m'malo mwa dziko la 1970s; Kuwawa kwa Iran, yomwe yalembedwa m'kutali kwa Iran hostage crisis, 1979; ndi kugwiritsa ntchito zokhazikika za Soviet invasion mu Afghanistan, 1979.

en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Chilimwe cha mafuta chikuchitirira kuti sichinachitike m'manja koma chifukwa chokhala ndi kugwira ntchito mwa kusintha nthawi kapena kuyendetsa. Amapereka anthu amene akuchita utumiki, ngati chiyambi chidachitike, chilimwe chikuchitirira kuti ndi chilimwe cha olimba ndipo sizozi zidachitika.

en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
ny: Moto wamayiko wapita pa makamaka a pulisimu mu Gaziantep, Uturuki pa nthawi ya kale ya asana ana ana ana asanu anamwalira anthu awiri a pulisimu ndi kuchititsa manyazi anthu zambiri zambiri zambiri zambiri.

en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
ny: Ofesi ya governor yalemba kuti anthu atatuwawa anayamba ndi maofesi a polisi.

en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
ny: Pulisi anatiuza kuti akuyembekezera munthu wina wochokera ku Daesh (ISIL) kuti ndiye wamkulu wa chitetezo cha chilimbikitso.

en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
ny: Anawona Dzuwa likuwonjezera pa zinthu zofanana ndi nyenyezi zina: Kukhala ndi ntchito ya nyenyezi zonse mu mfundo imachitika chifukwa cha kuyang'anira kwawo, kuyendetsa kwawo, ndipo zina zofuna.

en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
ny: Kusintha kwa mafano ndi kusintha kwa kugwiritsa ntchito pamodzi kuti kuthandiza kuchitira nkhani ya nyota ya Rossby, yomwe ili ndi kusintha kwa mafuta a plasma.

en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
ny: Ntchito yochepa ya nambala ya Rossby, ndi yochepa ntchito yamphamvu yamphamvu yamphamvu yomweyo.

en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
ny: Pamaso pa tsiku lake, Iwasaki anapita ndi ntchito m'makasitomala ambiri.

en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ny: Anayambidwa ndi anthu a mpira, anapulumutsidwa mu Tibet ndi mbwa yowawa, anapulumutsidwa kumudzi ku Nepal ndipo anapulumutsidwa mu India.

en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ny: Makalata 802.11n amapangitsa pa mabuku akulu ndi 2.4Ghz ndi 5.0Ghz.

en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
ny: Izi izatipatsa mphamvu yomwe idzakhala yomwe yabwino ndi 802.11a, 802.11b ndi 802.11g, pokhapokha ngati steshoni yamakono ikhala ndi mabodza.

en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
ny: Duvall, amene ali ndi mkazi ndi ana awiri a m'mbuyomu, sanalowe chikumbutso chachikulu pa Miller, amene anapereka chinsinsi.

en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ny: Pamene anapempha kuti atengeleze, Miller anati, "Mike amatsankha mawu ambiri pamene akupangira msonkhano...Ndikukhala ndikuchita tayika ndipo sindikukhulupirira kuti ndikudziwa zimene ankuti."

en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ny: "Tidzakhala tikulimbikitsa kutseka zolemba za carbon dioxide kuchokera m'malo a GDP ndi chifukwa chake kusintha kwa 2020 kuchokera pa malo a 2005," Hu ananena.

en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
ny: Iye sanapange chithunzi choti kusintha, akuti zidzakhala zikuchitika monga mafuko a China.

en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
ny: Hu walemekezera m'maiko ochuluka kuti "azikavoida njira yachipatala yachipatala yachipatala kapena kuyimba patsogolo."

en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
ny: Anamupatsa kuti "koma asiyeni kufunsa kuti atenge mabvuto amene amapita patsogolo pa tsogolo la akaziwo, chifukwa cha chitukuko chawo, chifukwa cha chitukuko chawo ndi chifukwa cha kusintha kwawo."

en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
ny: Chikhalidwe cha Iraq chachititsa ntchito chake pa 12:00 GMT lero.

en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
ny: Iyo ndi yomwe inayimba: Palibe munthu amene angathe kugwiritsa ntchito kuti chilichonse cha kusintha m'malo mwa Iraq kwa tsiku limene lija chidzakhale chitsanzo cha chigololo cha mafumu, kugwa kwa mafumu kapena kugwiritsa ntchito m'malo wokhala wokhala.

en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
ny: Mawu akhala ndi chitsimikizo cha kuyankhula bwino ndi kugwirizana m'malawi a Mtsogolo pa nkhani ya mabvuto a Middle East.

en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
ny: Makasitirani amatha kuwongolera zambiri pakati pa zonse zomwe zili m'malo mwa polisi ya Tsogolo ya Mtsogolo pa Iraq ndipo ikukhulupirira kusintha mtsinje wokha.

en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ny: Mtsogolo pa 78 zofunika zake ndi kuti chikumbumtima chabwino chidzakhala chikuchitika ngati kusintha kwa chikumbumtima cha dziko la Iraq kuchokera kwa mwaka uno kuti kuchititsa ntchito mafumu ake ndi kuchotsa chikumbumtima cha dziko lake ndi anthu ake.

en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ny: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la Argentina ndi Mtsogoleri wa kwanza wa dziko la Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner anatiyankhula kuti adzakhala Mtsogoleri wa dziko la iye pa tsiku la tsopano m'mmudzi wa La Plata, wokha 50 kilomita (31 maili) kuchokera ku Buenos Aires.

en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ny: Mbuya Kirchner anatiuza kuti adzakhala mtsogolo wa mtsogolo pa Argentine Theatre, chifukwa chake ndi chidziwitso chomwe ankachita kuyamba kampani yake ya 2005 pa Seneti ngati mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Buenos Aires.

en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ny: Chikumbutso chomwe timu yalikuyang'ana ndichifukwa cha mafuta a m'manja a galaxi ndi mafuta a m'manja a Milky Way adzalengedwa ndi mafuta a m'manja a m'manja.

en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
ny: Mwaka wa 1956 Słania anayamba ku Sweden, pamene mawa mwa tsiku tsopano anayamba kugwira ntchito pa Swedish Post Office ndipo anali woyamba wawo.

en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
ny: Iye anapanga zambiri zoposa 1,000 zokhala za Sweden ndi dziko lina la 28.

en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
ny: Kazi yake ndi ya ubora wamkulu ndi mafunso amene amamugwiritsa ntchito, ndipo ndi mmodzi wa anthu okhazikika kwambiri mwa anthu amene amakhala akugwira ntchito ya philatelists. Ena amakhala akugwiritsa ntchito yake yekha.

en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
ny: Chisankho chake cha 1,000 chinali chilichonse "Zinthu Zikulu za Mafumu a Sweden" ndi David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mwa 2000, yomwe ili m'dziyamba ya Guinness Book of World Records.

en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ny: Iye adakhalapo m'maonjeza mwa kugwira ntchito ya kuchipinda ndalama za banki kwa dziko lalikulu, mawu ake a tsiku lino akukhala ndi mawu a m'mbuyomu a Waziri Wamkulu pa m'manja wa ndalama za K5 ndi K100 za Kanada zatsopano.

en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
ny: Pakati pa chitukuko, Gibson anabweredwa ku hospital koma anafa tsiku lalikulu.

en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
ny: Gulu lachitiridwe, amene ali ndi umri wa 64, sanalumike mu chilango.

en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
ny: Gulu lomwe linali limachokera mu chilengedwe cha chilichonse chachitika pa tsiku la 1200 GMT linali lachokera.

en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
ny: Muntu amene akugwira ntchito mu gareji yomwe ili pafupi ndipo kuyambira nthawi imene accident yachitika anati: "Ana amakhala akusowa kuyenda pa mtsinje ndipo onse amakhalira ndi kuchimwa."

en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
ny: Onsewo anabwera kumwamba kuti kusakwera kwa chilichonse.

en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
ny: Zina zina zokhudza mu Bali ndi zokhazikika zina zomwe zimakhala pa mpando, ndi kugawana zinthu zokwanira kuti zipangire dziko lomwe likukula m'manja mwa kusamva.

en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
ny: UN ikufuna kukhala ndi mfundo yomwe idzakwaniritsa kupereka chithandizo kwa dziko zonse zomwe zili ndi ntchito ya kuphunzitsa kuwawa kwa dziko lonse lomwe likugwiritsidwa ntchito ndi kusintha kwa moyo wokhala.

en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
ny: Ndalamazo zingathe kupita kuchokera kumakaya amachitidwe ngati kusintha nyumba zomwe sizikagwilizana ndi mafuriko, kusintha kwa kusintha madzi, ndi kugwiritsa ntchito zina za ziwanda.

en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.

en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
ny: Ndithu ndi ma medal a 18 omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito pa tsiku, dziko lawo anagwirizana kuti asamale kupezeka pa podium ya ma medal.

en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
ny: Iwo ndi anthu a Netherlands, ndi Anna Jochemsen amapangitsa nthawi yomweyo ku nthawi ya Super-G, ndi Finland ndi Katja Saarinen amapangitsa nthawi yomweyo ku nthawi ya Super-G.

en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Mitchell Gourley wa Australia anatuluka pa nthawi ya kumaliza nthawi ya kumaliza pa nthawi ya Super-G ya ana a mwamuna. Mtsogoleri wa Czech, Oldrich Jelinek, anatuluka pa nthawi ya kumaliza nthawi ya kumaliza pa nthawi ya Super-G ya ana a wosauka.

en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
ny: Arly Velasquez wa Mexico anamaliza pa mwambo wa kumi na chinayi mu Super-G ya ana a kumwa kwa mwanamume. Adam Hall wa New Zealand anamaliza pa mwambo wa tisa mu Super-G ya ana a kusimama kwa mwanamume.

en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Mwana wa Poland Maciej Krezel wa kumwa kwa macho ndi Anna Ogarzynska wakufika pa nthawi yomweyi ya Super-G. Mwana wa South Korea Jong Seork Park wakufika pa nthawi yomweyi ya Super-G ya kumwa.

en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
ny: Mafunso a Umodzi wa UN, amene anafika ku Haiti pambuyo pa gulu la 2010, amalimbikitsidwa ndi kugwiritsa ntchito mchitidwe wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino wabwino

en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
ny: Chifukwa cha kusankha, zochepa zomwe zinatulutsidwa ku kampu ya UN sanalengeze bwino, zikapezeka kuti zikuyenda m'mtengo wa mtsinje wa Artibonite, mtsinje wokongola ku Haiti.

en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
ny: Pamaso pa kuwafika kwa mafupa, Haiti sanachite zinthu zomwe zili ndi chilengedwe cha chiwembu chifukwa cha chaka cha 1800.

en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
ny: Instituti ya Justice ndi Democracy ya Haiti yalembedwa ndi zikhazikiko zosiyanasiyana zimene zimakhala zimatsatira kuti batalioni ya UN ya Nepalese yalembedwa ndi ufulu wakuwombola kuti yalephera kuletsa mchitidwe ku Haiti.

en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ny: Danielle Lantagne, wosakhala wachinyamata wa UN pa chilengedwe cha mphamvu, anati kuti chilengedwe chidzakhala chokhazikika chifukwa cha anthu ake a chilengedwe cha chikhalidwe.

en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
ny: Hamilton wathandiza Howard University Hospital kumvera munthu wamene anamwalira mwa ndondomeko yowononga.

en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
ny: Mwana wakhala ku Nigeria, kuti kuli ziwiri zazikulu za virusi vya Ebola.

en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
ny: Mkhalidwe wakhala wakupanga ntchito zokhudza kukhala ndi chilungamo cha kugwiritsa ntchito mafuta, komanso kusintha mtsinje wamkulu kuti asanapange kukhala ndi chilungamo cha anthu ena kuti asanapange kukhala ndi chilungamo cha anthu ena.

en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
ny: Pansi pa The Simpsons, Simon anali akugwiritsa ntchito pa ma show ambiri m'maboma a ena.

en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
ny: Pa 1980s anayamba kugwira ntchito m'ma show ngati Taxi, Cheers, ndi The Tracy Ullman Show.

en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
ny: Mwaka wa 1989 anachitira chisokonezo cha The Simpsons ndi Brooks ndi Groening, ndipo anabwera ndi kugwiritsa ntchito timu ya anthu amene amagwira ntchito pa chisokonezo cha kusintha.

en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
ny: Poyamba akagwiritsa ntchito m'mapeto mwa 1993, anayamba kuyendetsa m'mapeto a executive producer, ndipo anatsatira kugwirira ntchito ndalama zambiri zambiri kuchokera m'mapeto kuchokera kwa anthu.

ny: Abambo a m'mudzi ochokera ku dziko lonse anaperekedwa ma bhajans, kapena nyimbo za kuwongofya, kwa Shri Shyam.

ny: Giancarlo Fisichella anapanga mafunso ake ndi gari lake ndipo anapanga mpira wokwera muyaya pa tsiku lomwe linali ndi kusintha.

en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
ny: Michael Schumacher anamaliza mbalame yake siku yomweyo ndipo Alonso, chifukwa cha chilolezo cha kugwiritsa ntchito m'mabala ambiri pamene amalimbikitsa mbalame.

en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
ny: "Anena kuti ndi wamkulu kwambiri ndipo amayimba bwino kwambiri," anati woyang'anira mawu a tsamba la chitetezo.

en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
ny: Ndinali ndikuyenda nthawi zonse tinalonjeza pa izi, kuchokera m'mtima wanga.

en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
ny: Pakati pa mizimu yachitatu ndi m'modzi, kamera yomwe ili m'malo mwa galimoto yachitatu yathunthu zambiri za foni ya kusunga zikuchita kugwetsa m'maso.

en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
ny: Koma, sanalimbike kuti anachititsa chifukwa chake chilichonse kwa shuttle.

en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
ny: Mtsogoleri wa mpando wa NASA, N. Wayne Hale Jr. anati, "Koma chifukwa chake ndi nthawi yomwe timakonda."

en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
ny: Pafupifupi pa chidziwitso, chaka chokhala chikuyenda, koma pafupifupi pamene mafuta akuyenda ndi mphamvu ya 70km/h... pano mvula ikubwera, koma yabwino ndi yabwino kwambiri kuti ikhale ndi chikondi chako ngati mpingo, pano mvula ikupita, anthu akupanga mantha ndi kusankha ndi kusamba ndi kugwira ntchito.

en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ny: "Ndimakonda dada wanga ndi mwamuna wake, ndipo pa njira yandipo anali anthu awiri ophunzira mu mabedwe, anthu akupita ndi kuwagwira," Armand Versace analankhula.

en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
ny: NHK yalembedwa kuti kumene kuli kwa nyumba yamagetsi ya Kashiwazaki Kariwa ku mtsinje wa Niigata anali akugwiritsa ntchito mokwanira.

en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
ny: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. yatulutsa kuti palibe zofunika zomwe zinachitika pa mafuta ndipo kuti mafuta a 1 ndi 2 pa ntchito zake za mafuta a nuclear a Shika sanachite ntchito.

en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
ny: Kusintha kwa nthawi yomwe 9400 mitsinje m'mudzi mwa dziko limodzi ndikumakhala osakhala ndi madzi ndipo ndi kugwiritsidwa ntchito 100 amene sali ndi umeme.

en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
ny: Zinthu zambiri zinapangidwa kuchepa, ntchito ya rela yalembedwa mu ena, ndipo Noto Airport ku Ishikawa prefecture simukudzavuta.

en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
ny: M'bomba imodzi yagwa panjira ya ofesi ya governor general.

en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
ny: Mitengo yamakumi atatu yomwe yagwira ntchito m'malo mwa masiku awiri yagwira ntchito ndi mitengo yomwe yagwira ntchito kumalowa m'malo mwa zofunika za boma.

en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
ny: Zofunika zina zimachitira kuti anthu okhudzidwa ndi anthu wopanda nzeru ndi atatu, ndipo zofunika zina zimathandiza kuti mpaka 30 anaphedwa; koma zofunika zina sizikudziwa konse.

en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
ny: Zonse zomwe zinapitilira ndi cyanuric acid ndi melamine zinapitilira m'masampulu a m'manja a mafupa amene anafa atsopano pochokera kuchita kudya chakudya cha mafupa a mafupa.

en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
ny: Makasitatu awo akhala akusankha ndi akhala kuti akhale ndi mafupa amene amatha kugwiritsa ntchito mafunso a kumwamba, anthu akhazikitsa pa chuo cha universiti.

en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
ny: Mafunso amalola mafupa azipatula mu mafupa a kanyi a mbuzi ndi kuchitira kuwonjezera melamine ndi cyanuric acid.

en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ny: Kusamutsa kwa mabwalo awa kumapangana ndi okhala mu malaŵi a mafupa pamene akuchitika ndi kusamutsa kwa infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
ny: Sindikudziwa ngati mukudziwa kapena osadziwa, koma zambiri za Central America zinakwana mu dziko lino osalakwa ndalama.

en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.

en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
ny: Iyo sanalakwitse kusintha kwa ine; koma sanalakwitse chilungamo.

en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
ny: Zonse ndikuti kwa anthu ndi kuti mukhale ndi ife monga ife tikukhala ndi inu.

ny: Mtsogoleri wa California Arnold Schwarzenegger anasainira mndandanda wokhala wokhala wokhala kapena kugulitsa mabuku a video omwe amatha kudzaza kwa ana.

ny: Huhne anayenda kuwala ndipo adzakhala wosintha mu Kabineti ndi Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP amakhululukidwa kuti azikhala wosintha ntchito ya Maminister a Bizinesi yomwe Davey akuyiwala.

ny: Schneider anapereka mawu ake pa videolink kuchokera ku USAF base m'mwambamo.

en: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
ny: Pansi pa chinjiri cha Lachinjiri, Carpanedo anachita kugwira ntchito m'masewera awiri a munthu pa Chikangawa.

en: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
ny: Mtsogoleri wake ndi Slalom, kuti anapatsidwa Did Not Finish mu mbali yake yotsiriza. 36 kumalipiridwa mwa 116 anthu omwe ankachita zimenezi mu mbali imeneyi.

en: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
ny: Mpira wake wina, Giant Slalom, wamuyika pa nthawi yowawa mu nthawi yowawa ya 4:41.30, 2:11.60 mita yoposa kuti mpira wa kwanza wa Austria Claudia Loesch ndi 1:09.02 mita yoposa kuti mpira wa kwanza wa Hungary Gyöngyi Dani.

en: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
ny: Ndalama ziwiri zomwe zimafika pa gulu la akazi amene amapita pa m'manja sanapite kukhala ndi mafunso awo, ndipo 45 kuchokera kwa 117 zonse zimene zimapita pa m'manja sanapite kukhala ndi mphamvu mu m'manja.

en: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
ny: Ntchito za Polisi za Madhya Pradesh zinatulutsa laptop yomwe yachokera kuwawa ndi foni yomwe yachokera kuwawa.

en: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".
ny: Wachiwiri wa Kapolisi wa Kupereka D K Arya anati, "Tinawapopa anthu awiri amene anabwera m'mwambo wa kumwera wa Swiss ndipo tinapanga kuchita kuti atchuke foni yake ndi laptop yake".

en: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.
ny: Akulu akudziwa ngati Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar ndi Vishnu Kanjar.

en: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
ny: Mwamuna wa polisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki anati kuti wopanda nkhawa anapita m'mahakamani ndi mavuto.

en: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
ny: Pamene anthu atatu anali m'dera pamene gari linali linali, palibe wawo amachita kugwira ntchito.

en: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
ny: Koma, mtsogoleri wapereka zinthu zosavuta kwa mafuta.

en: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT.
ny: Mtsinje yomwe munthu wapanga chitseko anali yotsegulidwa mpaka pa nthawi yomwe mafuta a chilango anamphulitsa mtsogoleri wamakina a Audi TT yochepa.

en: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
ny: Iye anali pa hospitali pa James Paget Hospital mu Great Yarmouth pa mwanzo.

en: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ny: Iye anapita ku chipatala cha Addenbrooke's ku Cambridge.

en: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
ny: Adekoya anali mu Edinburgh Sheriff Court kuchita chidwi ndi kugwiritsa ntchito mwana wake.

en: She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published.
ny: Iye ali mu msonkhano wa kugwiritsa ntchito ndi kugwiritsa ntchito, koma chilichonse chomwe chingakhale chilipo chikhala chikuchitika chifukwa chachikulu chake chakudziwika.

en: This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial.
ny: Izi ndi mwayi wokhala kumene ku UK koma kusintha kwa chilungamo cha Scotland ndi cholinga chake ndipo maphunziro amakondwerera kuti kusintha kwa maphoto akhoza kuchititsa manyazi.

en: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."
ny: Wofalitsa Professor Pamela Ferguson wa University of Dundee kuti "mabwana a journalista amayenda pa chilichonse ngati akupanga kuchapanso ma foto ndi zina za anthu omwe akufuna kuchititsa mtima."

en: Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment.
ny: Ofesi ya Mfumu, yomwe ili ndi mphamvu yonse yowonjezera maphunziro, yalankhula kwa amalangizi kuti palibe zina zidzakhala zidzakhala mpaka lero lero.

en: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.
ny: Dokumenti, monga mwa chilolezo, adzakhala ndi chidziwitso cha chitukuko cha mipingo, yomwe Palistine imakonda kuti idzikhala pa mipingo yomwe yayamba m'mwaka wa 1967 Mideast War.

en: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.
ny: Zina zina zomwe zinathandizidwa zinapangitsidwa kumanga dziko la Jerusalem lalikulu lomwe ndi la chilungamo kwa zonse zikulu ndi zomwe zimachitika mu dziko la Jordan.

en: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
ny: Israel ikufuna kukhala ndi chitetezo cha mafunso a m'manja mpaka kudzera mwaka wamakumi awiri pamene chitetezo chidzakwana, koma PA ikubweretsa kuti chitetezo chidzakhala chaka chitsopano.

en: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
ny: Abalekela m'malo mwa chikumbumtima cha kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu zokhazokha mwa chitetezo cha kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu zokhazokha zinali ndi kusamukira kwa ma ranger, chifukwa chake malo mwa chitetezo anali ndi kusamukira ndi kuthandizira.

en: In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program.
ny: Ku chitukuko cha NPWS ndi Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, anthu ochepa amapangidwa ntchito, pa mpando wa kugwira ntchito wa Sporting Shooters Association.

en: According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
ny: Chifukwa cha Mick O'Flynn, Mtsogoleri wa Kuphunzira ndi Kusintha kwa Nkhani za Kupanga Mphamvu ndi Chikhalidwe cha NPWS, anthu apamwamba amene anachitira ntchito ya kupanga mphamvu yomwe yachitika pa nthawi yomweyo anapereka mphamvu yomwe yachitira chilolezo ndi kuphunzira.

en: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday.
ny: Martelly anapita m'mtsogolo CEP yatsopano yomwe ili ndi anthu atatu zaka zina kale.

en: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years.
ny: Iyo ndi CEP yachiwiri ya Martelly mu mwaka wachiwiri.

en: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
ny: Mwezi wachipinda wachiwiri komisheni ya mtsogoleri yachiteteza kuti CEP yemweyo ikhale pansi ndi kusintha dzina la mtsogoleri kuti dziko likhale ndi ntchito zatsopano.

en: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.
ny: Komishoni imayenera kuchitika pa chitetezo cha Martelly ku ma demo a anthu ambiri amene anayamba mwezi wa October.

en: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
ny: Mavuto ambiri a mabungwe amapangidwa ndi kutsegula kwa mabvuto, ena akumaliza mwa 2011.

en: Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices.
ny: Wamtsogolo wa Japan, Wokongola ndi Mafunde ndi Maphunziro a Dziko la Japan (METI) anati kuti anali ndi chilungamo cha 27 chomwe chinali ndi zinthu zomwe zinakwera.

en: Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "non-serious."
ny: Mwachaka, METI watsutsa kuti Apple yatolera kuti zinali ziwiri zambiri zokhala ndi mafano, zomwe kompani yati "zokhala zopanda chifundo."

en: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."
ny: Boma linayankhula ndi kuyankhula kwa Apple kuti kuchuluka kwa mawu amene adayambitsa ndi "chifukwa chokhala chokoma kwambiri."

en: The eathquake struck Mariana at 07:19 a.m. local time (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).
ny: Kutembenuka kwa dziko la Mariana linali 07:19 pa nthawi ya dziko (09:19 pa nthawi ya GMT pa Lachinjiri).

en: The Northern Marianas emergency management office said that there were no damages reported in the nation.
ny: Ofesi ya kusamalira kwa mavuto a Northern Marianas imati kuti palibe mavuto omwe anayankhulidwa m'malawi.

en: Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said that there was no Tsunami indication.
ny: Pamenepo, Tsunami Warning Center ya Pacific yati kuti palibe chidziwitso cha Tsunami.

en: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines.
ny: Mpolopolo wamakolo wa Filipino wakupita Hong Kong anapulumutsa abale awo a Hong Kong ndi kugwiritsa ntchito basi lawo ku Manila, kapitolo ka Philippines.

en: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.
ny: Rolando Mendoza anayambitsa ndi mpira wake wa M16 kwa aturisti.

en: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far.
ny: Zinthu zambiri zinabwera kuchokera kwa anthu okhala m'mapeto ndipo angapo ena akuchitika kuti anafa atatu.

en: Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers.
ny: Nkhalamba ndi ana a zaka zochepa anayambitsidwa m'zaka zochepa, ngati anayambitsidwa ma photographer a Filipino.

en: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
ny: Abaphotografero akuchokera patsogolo anamanga mkazi wamkulu chifukwa chomwe anachita kukhala ndi maliro. Mendoza anapulumuka.

en: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.
ny: Liggins anafika m'mitima ya baba yake ndipo anayamba ndi ntchito ya maphunziro.

en: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959.
ny: Iye anayenera kugwiritsa ntchito ngati wachikazi wa kusunga mimba ndipo anayamba kugwira ntchito pa Hospital ya Akalandi ya Mwamuna wa Mwamuna mwa 1959.

en: While he was working at the hospital Liggins began to investigate premature labor during his spare time.
ny: Pamene adakhalira kumayiko Liggins anayamba kuchita kachitidwe cha kuchunguza kuzindikira kwa ana amene akupita mtsogolo wake.

en: His research showed that if a hormone was administered it would speed up the baby's foetal lung maturation.
ny: Chifukwa chake, mafunso ake anapereka kuti ngati mafuta amaperekedwa, zidzakweza kukula kwa mapulmoni a mwana wamphulira.

en: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
ny: Abwenzi a mafana a mafana anapereka chikumbumtima kwa Luna.

en: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."
ny: Tommy Dreamer anati "Luna anayamba kuwa Mbuya wakwanu wa Extreme. Meneja wakwanu. Luna anapitiliza pa usiku wa mwezi wawiri. Mbuya wakwanu wamkulu monga yeye. Mwanamkazi wakwanu wamkulu."

en: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."
ny: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels anatiwonjeza kuti "Luna anali wakumwamba ngati ine...kapena ngati sakupeza...ndimukonda ndipo ndidzamumva...kuyambira pano ndiye akhala m'dziko lalikulu."

en: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008.
ny: Ku 1,400 amene anapangidwa masiku ano pa chisankho cha 2010 cha dziko lalikulu, amene akudandaula kuti Malawi idzakhala dziko lalikulu anadzidzidwa ndi 8% kuyambira 2008.

en: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.

en: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
ny: Pa nthawi zofanana ndi mpando, 29% wa amene adasankha amafuna kuti Australia ikhale dziko la m'mwamba monga patsogolo, koma 31% amafuna kuti Australia isakhale dziko la m'mwamba.

en: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
ny: Mwambo wa gulu la dhahabu la Olympic analipangidwa kusunga m'mitengo ya 100m ndi 200m ya kusunga m'mitengo ya m'mitengo ya Commonwealth, koma chifukwa cha malamulo ake, kusunga kwake kuli kuwiri.

en: He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.
ny: Iye sanalole kuyenda mafuta amene amafuna kudzera m'mphamvu zake chifukwa chomwe amakhala akufuna kudzera m'maganizo.

ny: Mipingo yambiri yaliphatikizidwa kuti yalipatikizidwa m'malo mwa February ndipo yalipangidwa pa Lachinayi.

en: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
ny: Zizukulu zingathe kuti zinagwiritsa ntchito mayeso a madzi kwa dziko lino pambuyo ndi zinthu zosowa zomwe zingagwiritsa ntchito kubweretsa mafuta ndi kudziwika kwa moyo.

en: Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
ny: Mafunso amalola kuti adziwe ngati dziko zinapangidwa ndi chiyani, monga dziko la Mphamvu linapangidwa, chifukwa chakuti kumaliza kwa mwezi kumapangidwa ndi dziko la Mphamvu.

en: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
ny: Cuomo, 53, anayamba kuyamba kwa ulamuliro wake m'mwaka uliopita ndipo anasainira mchitidwe mwezi wachiwiri uliopita kuti usamalire ndi kugwirizana ndi munthu wamkazi wamkazi.

en: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
ny: Anamuthandiza zimenezi ngati "kukhala ndi mavuto a chisiasa ndi kusowa mtima".

en: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
ny: Iye amapangidwa kuti atenge mphamvu ya mtsogoleri mu 2016.

en: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
ny: NextGen ndi mfundo yomwe FAA ikutsutsana kuti izachiteteza ndege kugwira ntchito makhadi osatsika ndi kugwiritsa ntchito galoni zambiri za mafuta pa mwaka ndi kusunga zitsulo za carbon.

en: It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.
ny: Ili ndi zochitika zomwe zimachitika pa satelaiti komanso zomwe zimachitika pa golo lomwe zimachitika pa radar kuti atsogoleri a ndege akhale ndi chilichonse chokwanira ndi kusankha ndege ndi chifukwa cha chilichonse chomwe chimapereka mafunso a ndege a chilichonse.

en: No extra transport is being put on and overground trains will not stop at Wembley, and car parking and park-and-ride facilities are unavailable at the ground.
ny: Kulibe mafuta ambiri akugwiritsidwa ntchito ndipo mafuta a ndege osagwiritsa ntchito sazakhala ku Wembley, ndipo mafuta a mota ndi mafunso a park-and-ride sadzakhala opanda patsogolo.

en: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
ny: Mawu a kuchita kukhala palibe tsiku la kugwiritsa ntchito gulu la mpira lili ndi mphamvu yoti mpira udzakhala wakuchita kugwira pa m'manja pa anthu osamangidwa.

en: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.
ny: Makasitomala akupangidwa pa Lachinjiru m'makalata a Science pa tsiku la Lachinjiru limodzi pa dziko la Galápagos la Ekwado.

en: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ny: Anayambirana kuti, anthu akhazikika ku Chuo cha Princeton mu dziko la United States ndi Chuo cha Uppsala mu Sweden anapereka kuti chilengedwe chachikulu chachitika m'masiku awiri, komanso m'kati mwa izi, koma chilengedwe ichi chinali chofuna kutha kwa m'masiku ambiri, chifukwa cha kugwirizana kwa mbalame ya Darwin ya dziko, Geospiza fortes, ndi mbalame ya kachere, Geospiza conirostris.

en: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
ny: Mphuno wakuda ndi kusintha m'mafomu onse. Inatha kusintha m'mafomu osintha.

en: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice.
ny: Izi ndi zomwe zikuyenera kuchitika mwa pH ya chikale. Mungathe kuchita chidziwitso chomwe chidzakhala chakuchitika ndi mowa wa kabichi woyamba.

en: The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is.
ny: Mphalanganga wachikuli wachimanga mawu ngati mukuyenera kumangidwa kapena kumangidwa (kuphatikizika) kwa chithunzi.

en: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical.
ny: Ntchito yamph pH ikuyenera kusonyeza ndi kusinthidwa kwa maionu a Hydrogen (H mu pH) mu chithandizo chomwe chachitiridwa mtengo.

en: Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
ny: Mipira ya Hydrogen ndi mipira yomwe inali ndi ma electron omwe anapangidwa kuwala (chifukwa chake mipira ya Hydrogen ikuchokera kwa mpira wosatha ndi mpira wosatha).

en: Swirl the two dry powders together and then, with clean wet hands, squeeze them into a ball.
ny: Kukweza mafuta awiri a tsabola ndi kuyambira, ndipo, ndi manja omwe akuyera, kuchepetsa kumene kwa mpira.

en: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
ny: Zokhazikira pa mabvuto ako zidzakhala ndi zomwe zidzakhala ndi zizindikiro zokhala zomwe zidzakhala ndi zokhala zokhala.

en: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
ny: Maboma a Harappa ndi Mohenjo-daro anali ndi toilet yomwe imakhala mu nyumba yonse, yomwe ili ndi mfundo yabwino ya kusambira madzi.

en: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
ny: Zikakula za mfundo zinapitilizira ku nyumba za miji ya Minoan ya Crete na Santorini m'malawi wa Greece.

en: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
ny: Pali pano palipo mabatoni ku dziko la kale la Egypt, Persia ndi China. Mu dziko la Roman, mabatoni anali m'maiko a m'manja a m'manja ambiri, pamene anthu a m'muna ndi a m'mwamuna anali pamodzi m'maiko a m'manja.

en: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
ny: Pamene mukalira munthu amene ali ndi zaka zambiri kuchokera kwanu, mukufuna kutumiza satelaiti.

en: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.
ny: Satelaiti yomwe ili m'mphamvu inapanga chilolezo ndipo ikuyankhula ndi kuyankhula kwambiri.

en: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
ny: Satelaiti yalowa m'mphamvu ndi roketi. Mafunso amayankhula matelasi m'mphamvu chifukwa dziko la Mlungu limapanga zinthu zathu zambiri ndi mtundu.

en: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
ny: Ili ndi msonkhano wokhala wamkulu wokhala ndi zaka 100 zokhala ngati kuti ukhale satelaiti kapena teleskope mu dziko la m'manja.

en: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
ny: Mkhalamba wapanga chilungamo dziko lonse ndi zambiri zosangalatsa. Chilichonse chomwe mkhalamba wapanga chathu ndichoti titha kusintha ndi kusintha zambiri ndi mphamvu yabwino.

en: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
ny: Ili tinali ndi gulu, gari, ndi zina zambiri za kugwira ntchito.

en: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.
ny: Pansi pawo ndi ana a kachewere a m'modzi amene amadya ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri zokhala ndi ziwiri ziwiri z

en: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
ny: Kuphatikiza, pali mafuko ambiri a mbuzi (mwa anthu omwe amakhala ndi mbuzi zomwe zikuyenda) amene amadya zinthu zambiri zomwe zili ndi anthu omwe amadya zinthu zambiri zambiri monga nkhokwe, mbeu, mafuta, ndi nsanje.

en: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
ny: Mawu akufuna maphunziro awo ndi chitetezo cha chigawo, ntchito yabwino yomwe kumakhala nayo kwa kila paka imawathandiza kuti asakane ndi ena.

en: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
ny: Nsomba ndi mafumu ake otsiriza, akhala mu maboma otsiriza akutanthauza zokhazokha.

en: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.
ny: Mabala ndi awo amakhala ndi amuna amodzi kuyambira kwa nthawi yomweyo mpaka atatu, pamodzi ndi amayi amodzi zaka zambiri ndi ana amodzi.

en: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
ny: Amayi ndi anthu otsogolera amene amakhalira kumangidwa ndi anzawo, monga m'mudzi wachikulu wa ankhungu ndi ana awo.

en: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
ny: Mafumu a simba amakhala ngati mafumu a mbalame kapena mbwa, zilonda zofanana kwambiri ndi simba (koma sili ziwiri zina zokonda) mu chitukuko, ndi ndi zopanda pake zopanda pake kwa anthu amene akugwira ntchito.

en: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
ny: Mwana wamphamvu wosatha, nyau akhoza kugwira ntchito (koma osatha bwino), kugwira, kusaka m'maona ogonjetsa ndi kusamala ndi mphamvu yoyambira ndi mphamvu yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira yoyambira

en: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.
ny: Nkhosa ndi m'gulu lomwe lomwe (Genus Panthera) ndi nsimbi, mafuta, ndi mafuta. A ma kaka awiriwa ndiwo amene akhoza kuyimba.

en: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
ny: Kukhala kwa nkhosa si kuchita kumva ngati kumva kwa simba wokha, koma ngati mawu a m'manja a kumva.

en: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
ny: Ocelots amapenda kudya m'manja amitundu yoyera. Zidzakweza mbewu, nyoka, mafuta ndi nkhuku ngati zingathe. Zonse zowona zomwe ocelot amakweza ndi zosavuta kuposa yomwe ili.

en: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.
ny: Mafunso akudziwa kuti ocelots amafuna ndi kuyenda ndi kudziwa zinthu zomwe adzidya (kuphika) ndi mafuta, kuyambira kumene adali pa mphiri.

en: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
ny: Iwo amayimba bwino kwambiri pa usiku ndi mtima wawo wokhala wokhala, ndipo amagwira ntchito bwino kwambiri. Ocelots amayimba ndi kuyambira kwa mawu awo ndipo kugwira ntchito ndi kuyambira kwa mawu awo.

en: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
ny: Pamene mtsogoleri wachinsinsi wachinsinsi wachinsinsi (chinsinsi chachikulu) wakhalira kugwirizana ndi chinsinsi chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu ch

en: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
ny: Makolo amenewo akukhala ndi zinthu zina zokwanira ndi anthu otsata zina, kotero anthu amenewo adzakhala ndi zinthu zina kapena maphunziro opitirira kuti adzikhale anthu otsata otsogolera kuposa zimene ankafuna kale.

en: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before.
ny: Anthu a chikhalidwe chachikulu sanapange chilichonse, amangodzadzana ndi zonse zomwe anayenera kuyenera kale.

en: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
ny: Pamaso pa nthawi, pamene anthu a m'manja mwa mpopo amapangidwa kugwiritsa ntchito m'manja mwa mpopo wawo watsopano, amapangidwa kuyang'ana ndi kuyang'ana kwa anthu ena.

en: Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species.
ny: Chifukwa chake, pakati pa masiku ambiri kapena mamilioni, anthu awiri adzakhala ndi mtundu wosiyana kwambiri kuti asinthe kusankha mtundu wosiyana.

en: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
ny: Timatiwona mchitidwe uno ndi kugwiritsa ntchito kwa ziwanda, zomwe zimachitika ndi kugwiritsa ntchito ziwanda zatsopano. Kugwiritsa ntchito ziwanda ndi chifukwa chofanana ndi kugwiritsa ntchito ziwanda zatsopano ndi chidziwitso chachikulu cha kugwiritsa ntchito ziwanda.

en: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
ny: Mabanda amapanga oksijeni yomwe anthu amapumula, ndipo amapereka carbon-dioxide yomwe anthu amapuma (ndiye, amapumula).

en: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.
ny: Mabanda amapanga chakudya chawo kuchokera pa mwezi ndi photosynthesis. Iwo amapereka nkhondo.

en: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
ny: Ife tikugwira nyumba zathu ndi mitengo ndipo tikugwera zinthu zathu ndi mitengo. Zinthu zambiri zomwe ife timadya ndi mitengo. Poyamba, zinthu zosadziwika zimakhala ndi mitengo, mbewu sizimayenera kudzalira.

en: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
ny: Mosasaurus anali wopanda nzeru wa nthawi yake, kotero sanalowe chifukwa cha mosasaurs ena.

en: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
ny: Njira zake zokoma zinali zonse zomwe zinapangidwa ndi zambiri zopanda kuchuluka zokhala ndi zambiri zopanda kuchuluka zokha zomwe zinapangidwa m'mtima wake, zimene zinachitika kuti palibe chilichonse chomwe chingapite m'mtundu wake.

en: We don't know for sure, but it may have had a forked tongue. Its diet included turtles, large fish, other mosasaurs, and it may even have been a cannibal.
ny: Sitikudziwa bwino, koma ndi zowonjezera kuti anamva ndi zowonjezera. Chakudya chake chinali matapwiri, nkhuku zoyera, zina zina za mosasaurs, ndi zowonjezera zingati zinali m'mimba.

en: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.
ny: Iyo yalembedwa kuti yamangidwa zonse zomwe zinayenda m'manja; ngakhale nyamadziko yoyamba monga T. rex sizidzatha kwa iyo.

en: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse
ny: Pamene zambiri za chakudya chawo zingakhale zikundipatsa mwayi, anthu a Roman amayenera kukhala ndi zambiri zowonjezera kapena zosazindikilika za chakudya, monga nkhumba yam'mawa, mpepe, masamba, ndi chilengedwe chomwe chinachititsa kuti ndi chilengedwe cha kudula.

en: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
ny: Chilichonse chachikulu chinali kuti pamene anthu ochuluka ndi mkazi anadya chakudya chawo pamene akugona m'miti, anthu ochuluka amapemphera kudya m'ma banquete amene amagwira ntchito m'mitima yawo pamene akudya chakudya chawo.

en: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
ny: Mipira ya Roman yamakonda kusiyana ndi zitetezo zomwe zinabwera ku Europe kuchokera ku America kapena ku Asia mu masiku a m'mawa.

en: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
ny: Mwachitsanzo, sanali ndi mowa, kapena ma-tomato, kapena ma-potato, kapena ka-koko, ndipo palibe munthu wa dziko la Roma wamva nthochi.

en: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
ny: Ababiloni anayenda ndi kumanga zinthu zonse za Mulungu wawo m'mtembo wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu wamkulu.

en: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
ny: Anthu adzakhala akuletsa zikololo kwa mizimu ndipo achipembezo adzakhala akusankha kugwira ntchito za mizimu m'malipiro ndi mabuku.

en: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
ny: Zonse zikhala ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dziko la mtengo lomwe linali ndi dz

en: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
ny: Kukhala ndi ziggurats zokhala zokhala zomwe zinachitidwa kuti zikhale m'ma temple.

en: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.
ny: Mtsinje wa towala uli ndi mpingo wosavuta wa Mulungu.

en: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
ny: M'mawa m'maiko a m'mwamba, nyumba siyinakula kwambiri.

en: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air.
ny: Kukhala kwa boma la m'nyumba ya Heberi kuliwoneka kwambiri m'mtundu wam'manja.

en: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
ny: Amai anafuna kuchemera m'mbali ya nyumba; ma shop amakhala ndi m'modzi wosakwera kuti apite ku mtsinje. Mwala unachitira kugwira nyumba.

en: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
ny: Palibe m'mitundu yabwino m'm'dziko la Canaan, chifukwa chake mbawa yayamba yakhala yosauka kwambiri.

en: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
ny: Malamulo a Greenland anali ochepa. M'ma saga za Norse amati Erik the Red anali wopweteka ku Iceland chifukwa cha ukatili, ndipo pamene anali akupita m'mwambamo, anapita ku m'mwamba wa Greenland ndipo anamupatsa dzina la Greenland.

en: But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time.
ny: Koma ngati zonse, mbuyomu wakufunika, anthu a Eskimo anali akhala kuno pa nthawi imeneyo.

en: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
ny: Pamaso pa dziko lonse, pali zambiri zosiyana m'maiko, makhosi, zokonzekera ndi chilengedwe cha Denmark, Sweden, Norway ndi Iceland.

en: If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence.
ny: Ngati mukuyimba mwayi wa National Treasure, mungachite manyazi kuti mapu a mwayi wagwiritsidwa ntchito pa m'mtima wa Declaration of Independence.

en: However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map.
ny: Koma, izi sizili zoona. Komabe, pali zinthu zomvesa m'makono mwa chitetezo, izi sizili mapu a chikondi.

en: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
ny: Ku nyuma ya Chikumbutso cha Kudzaza ndi Chikumbutso cha Kudzaza cha 4th July 1776. Mawuwa amapitilira pa mphamvu ya chithandizo, m'mtima wa chithandizo, pamwamba pansi.

en: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.
ny: Poyamba palibe munthu amene amadziwa bwino amene ananditsa, koma kumadziwa kuti m'malo mwa moyo wake, chithandizo chachikulu cha phapata (chidzakhala ndi mphamvu ya 29¾ zinthu ndi 24½ zinthu) chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala chidzakhala.

en: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
ny: Kuti, ndi zokhazokha kuti chithunzi chinalengeza lidzachitikira ngati mawu.

en: The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free.
ny: Kusintha ku D-Day ndi mphamvu zina zomwe zinapangitsa kumwera mwa Ufaransa, koma kusintha kumwera sakuwoneka.

en: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them.
ny: Iyi ndi yalulidwa ndi "Vichy" wafalansa. Iwo anali anthu wa Ufaransa amene anapanga chilungamo ndi akalema m'ma 1940 ndipo anafuna ndi akhazikika pamene anawononga ndi kuyambira.

en: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".
ny: Pa 15 August 1940, Alayi anavula m'mtundu wa m'malawi wa France, mavula anavulidwa "Operation Dragoon".

en: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.
ny: Mwa zaka ziwiri zomwezi, anthu a America ndi a Free French anapulumutsa m'mwera wa France ndi kuyenda kumudzi wa Germany.

en: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society.
ny: Chilengedwe ndi chilengedwe chokha chachikulu chimene chidzakhazikika ndi anthu ambiri ochokera m'mudzi ndi kuchita ntchito mwa chitukuko, m'mudzi.

en: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
ny: Ntanthauzo ya chilungamo ili ndi chiyankhulo cha Latin civilis, chifukwa cha kuchokera ku Latin civis, chifukwa cha kuchokera ku mtsogoleri, ndi civitas, chifukwa cha kuchokera ku mzinda kapena mzinda-wa-mzinda, ndipo izi zonse zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala zimakhala z

en: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.
ny: Maboma a m'mzinda ndi anthu amene amapangidwa ku dziko. Nkhondo ya chilengedwe chikuchitika ndi kusintha mwa maboma a m'mzinda, kusintha kwa chilengedwe cha anthu ndi kusintha kwa zinthu zokhazokha.

en: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
ny: Zinthu zopanda mphamvu zimakhala zikapita tsiku lina ngati zili pachikhalidwe cha m'mabuku a chidziwitso cha m'dziko ndipo sizikhoza kukhala zikudziwika ngati maphunziro a chikhalidwe.

en: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.
ny: Pa nthawi ya Mavuto a Ulemu, mafuko a tsiku la 13 anayambitsa boma la tsiku la nthawi yomwe—ndi Boma la Mtsogolo lomwe likuyenera—pamodzi ndi Boma la Mtsogolo la Mtsogolo la Mtsogolo.

en: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
ny: Malamulo sanapange ntchito yoyang'ana ndalama, ndipo, chifukwa palibe woyendetsa wam'malawi kapena woyendetsa m'malawi, anayamba kusankha anthu a m'malawi, amene sanali ndi chikondi, kuti adzitumikire zonse zomwe zinali zonse.

en: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
ny: Iyo ndiyo sanali ndi mphamvu yoti idzalimbikitsa maphunziro a msonkho ndi mabuluzi pakati pa mizinda.

en: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
ny: Zinthu zimakhazikitsidwa ndi kukhulupirika kwambiri kwa onse amipingo ngati zikhale zikafikidwa ndipo mipingo yomweyi yakhala yotsegula chuma kuti amalawi akhale osakhalitsa.

en: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
ny: Timu ya bawo ya mpira wa m'madera a Italy, pansi ndi timu ya bawo ya mpira wa m'madera a Germany ndi timodzi ndi timu yamakono a dziko lonse lapansi ndipo anayamba kuwa mabwana a FIFA World Cup m'mwaka wa 2006.

en: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
ny: Zinthu zosiyana ndi mphamvu zokonda ndi kuchitira ntchito mpira, baskiti, voleboli, mpila wa madzi, kusowa, rugbi, kusamalira, mpila wa madzi wa nyenyezi ndi F1 motor racing.

en: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
ny: Mau a m'mawa ndi amene akuyenera kuwoneka kwambiri m'maeneo a Kaskazini, ndi anthu a Italy amene akupambana m'maiko a dziko lonse ndi mabuku a Olimpiki.

en: Japans holds nearly 7,000 islands (the biggest being Honshu), making Japan the 7th largest island in the world!
ny: Japan ili ndi dziko la m'maiko 7,000 (lolemekezeka ndi Honshu), likuyenda Japan ndi dziko lalikulu la m'maiko a dziko lapansi!
