en: Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco.
ny: Casablanca ndi dziko lomwe lalikulu kwambiri kuti kugula m'malo m'malo onse a Morocco.

en: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
ny: Ku madina yowawa, ndi bwino kuyamba maiko okwerapo amakonda kugulitsa zinthu zokonzekera za Moroko, monga tagines, zibvalo, zinthu za lembo, hookahs, ndi zinthu zina zambiri, koma zonsezi ndi za anthu a kuwona.

en: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda.
ny: Goma ndi dziko la anthu amene amagwiritsa ntchito m'maiko a Demokalaseya ya Kongo m'mtundu wathu wakuwawa kumwera kwa Rwanda.

en: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.
ny: Mwaka wa 2002 Goma anayambitsidwa ndi mafuta a volkeno ya Nyiragongo yomwe yamphunzitsa mafuta ambiri a m'makono a mzinda, monga m'makono a mzinda.

en: While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province.
ny: Poyamba Goma ndi bwino, koma kugwiritsa ntchito kumaliza Goma kuyenera kuchita utumiki wokhala wokonzeka kuti tizindikire ntchito ya mavuto amene akukhala mu dziko la North Kivu.

en: The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa.
ny: Mzinda ndi dziko lomwe linali ndi chithandizo cha kupanda mlima wa Nyiragongo ndi kusintha nkhondo ya Mafumu a Mtsinje mu Afrika.

en: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
ny: Mungathe kugwira ntchito boda-boda (moto taxi) kuti mukagone Goma. Tsiku lalikulu (lokal) ndalama ndi ~500 Congolese Francs kwa mwayi wamakono.

en: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands.
ny: Pamaso ndi kusintha kwake kwa kusankha, "Timbuktu" wapita kulemba ngati mfundo ya dziko la kusintha.

en: Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport.
ny: Lero, Timbuktu ndi dziko loipa, komanso ndi chidziwitso chake chomwe chimachitira kuti ndi mwayi wa anthu, ndipo ndi ndegepo.

en: In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands.
ny: Mwaka wa 1990, panali m'dandaulo la maboma a dziko lapansi a kuwala, chifukwa cha chidwi cha mchere wa dziko.

en: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
ny: Iyi ndi m'malo wamkulu wachinsinsi pamene Henry Louis Gates anapita ku PBS ndi Wonders of the African World.

en: The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African.
ny: Umunthu watha ndi kusintha kwambiri kwa maboma ena a dziko lonse, chifukwa chake ili ndi zambiri zambiri za Arabu kuposa za Africa.

en: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.
ny: Nkhaniyi yamapeto a Kruger National Park (KNP) ili m'mzinda wa kaskazini-mtsinje wa Afrika yachokera m'malawi ndipo ikugwira ntchito m'malawi wa m'mzinda wa Mozambique m'mtsinje, Zimbabwe m'mzinda wa kaskazini, ndipo m'mzinda wa kusini ndi mtsinje wa Crocodile.

en: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife.
ny: Ntchito yamaparki yachimanga 19,500 km² ndi yachitsegwa m'mizinda 14 yachilengedwe cha m'munda, zonse zikumwera m'mitundu yochuluka yachilengedwe cha dziko.

en: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
ny: Ili ndi m'mene zikuchitikira ku Afrika yosiyana ndi zonse ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kwake ndi kusintha kw

en: As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park.
ny: Ngati ndi zonse za South African National Parks, pali mafuta a chilengedwe ndi mafuta a kugwira ntchito pa park.

en: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
ny: Icho ndikhoza kukhala wabwino kuyika Wild Card, yomwe ikufunika kudzera mu maphunziro a mizinda yomweyo mu Afrika yachinsinsi kapena onse a mizinda yonse ya National Parks ya Afrika yachinsinsi.

en: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus.
ny: Nyanja ya Hong Kong ndi yomwe imapereka dziko la Hong Kong dzina lake ndi ndi dziko lomwe ambiri a matulutsi amakondwerera ngati chuma chachikulu.

en: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour.
ny: Ntchito yaboma yamakono a Hong Kong imeneyi yafanizidwa ndi chithunzi chachikulu chachikulu chokwanira chomwe chikuchitikira ndi kudzera kwa madzi a Victoria Harbour.

en: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
ny: Kukhala ndi mawu a bwino a Hong Kong, khalani ku dziko ndi kuwotcha ku Kowloon waterfront yomwe ili pansi.

en: The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore.
ny: Nthawi yambiri yachikondi cha dziko la Hong Kong Island ndi chilengedwe chachikulu chomwe chidzachitika pa dziko lochokera ku nthawi yamakono pa mpando wamtsinje wam'mwamba.

en: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ny: Iyi ndi dziko lomwe anthu a Britain anachita kuyika kwa iwo ndipo ngati ukufuna chilolezo cha dziko lomwe lalikulu, iyi ndi dziko lalikulu lomwe ukhoza kuyamba.

en: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.
ny: Za Sundarbans ndi m'mwamba wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda wakuyenda

en: The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park.
ny: Sundarbans yagwiritsidwa kuti ikhale UNESCO World Heritage Site. Part yowonjezera m'mitundu ya India ikuyenera kuchitidwa Sundarbans National Park.

en: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain.
ny: M'mitundu ya m'mitundu si zofuna zofuna zofuna — zimakhala ndi zofuna zina zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna zofuna z

en: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
ny: Makalani a Sundarbans akugwiritsa ntchito eneo la 3,850 km², koma kuchokera kwa nthawi imeneyi, eneo lalikulu lili ndi madzi/makalani.

en: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ny: Kuyambira 1966, Sundarbans ndi dziko la dziko la dziko, ndipo kuchokera pa 400 Royal Bengal tigers ndi kuchokera pa 30,000 mbawala zilipo m'malo.

en: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
ny: Mabasi amapita ku stesheni ya basi ya m'mudzi (pamodzi ndi m'manja), m'mbuyomu m'mbuyomu, koma ambiri, monga amene akupita kumwera ndi Jakar/Bumthang amapita kati ya 06:30 ndi 07:30.

en: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.
ny: Pamaso pa magalimoto a maboma, ndi bwino kugula tikiti m'ma tsiku ochepa pambuyo.

en: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.
ny: Mafupi a madera ndi a Coaster Buses a Japan, amene ndi amayenda mokwanira ndi amakonda.

en: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ny: Makalata amene amagawana ndi anthu ndi njira yabwino ndi yabwino yomwe ikufika ku malo a pafupi, monga Paro (Nu 150) ndi Punakha (Nu 200).

en: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
ny: Mtsinje wa Mtsinje wa Oyapock ndi mtsinje wokhala ndi zinthu zosintha. Imafunika mtsinje wa Oyapock kuti uchitane mafumu a Oiapoque mu Brazil ndi Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock mu French Guiana.

en: The two towers rise to a height of 83 meters, it's 378 meters long and it has two lanes of 3.50 m wide.
ny: Mabiribiri awiri akula mpaka ku mphamvu ya mita 83, ndi ndalama zake zikukhala mita 378 ndi mabala awiri opanda mita 3.50 zokhala zikulu.

en: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.
ny: Kukhala ndi chikumbutso cha 15 mita pansi pa chigawo cha mtsinje. Kugwiritsidwa ntchito kwatsala mwezi wa Agalu 2011, koma sanapangidwe kuti igwiritsidwe ntchito mpaka mwezi wa Mawosi 2017.

en: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.
ny: Mtsinje udzakhala wokhala wokhala m'mwezi wa Septembala 2017, pamene mabukhu a Brazilian amalipiro amalipiro adzakhala akumaliza.

en: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
ny: Abantu a Guaraní anali anthu a m'maboma a m'mwera wa Paraguay, amakhala ngati anthu olimba amene amapereka chakudya chokwanira.

en: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
ny: Malamulo a Chaco anali nyumba ya mafulu a anthu a m'mawa monga Guaycurú ndi Payaguá, amene ankachitira bwino ndi kugwira ntchito, kugwira ntchito ndi kugula.

en: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
ny: Mu tsiku la 16 m'zaka za Paraguay, yemwe anachitidwa "Mtsinje Wamkulu wa Mabungwe a Indies", anapita chifukwa cha kukhala ndi anthu a Spain amene anapambana ndi anthu a m'mabungwe a m'mwamba.

en: The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries.
ny: AmaSpaniard anayamba mtsogolo wa kugwiritsa ntchito, wokhudzidwa ndi masiku atatu.

en: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.
ny: Kuchokera pa chikumbutso cha Asunción m'mwaka wa 1537, Paraguay yakhala yomweyi ndi chidziwitso chake cha anthu ake ndi utumiki.

en: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.
ny: Argentina ndi dziko lalikulu kwambiri la timu yabwino ya polo ndi anthu ake pa dziko lonse.

en: The largest tournament of the year takes place in December at the polo fields in Las Cañitas.
ny: Tsiku lachikulu la mwayi lili ndi mwezi wa Disemba pa mabuku a polo ku Las Cañitas.

en: Smaller tournaments and matches can also be seen here at other times of the year.
ny: Zilipo mabanki ndi mafumu a tsiku lina lomwe.

en: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
ny: Kuti mawu amenewa akhale ndi zambiri za mpira wa polo ndi kuti kugula ma ticket kwa mpira wa polo, choncho onani Asociacion Argentina de Polo.

en: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).
ny: Dzina la ndalama yamakono a Falkland ndi Falkland pound (FKP) yomwe yakhala ndi thandizo la pound yamakono ya Britain (GBP).

en: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.
ny: Ndalama zingathe kusinthidwa pa banki yomwe ndi yowoneka m'maiko amene ili ku Stanley kumapangidwa ndi FIC West store.

en: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted.
ny: Pa ndale zonse, pa mizinda yonse ndi m'malo mwawo, ndalama za Uingereza zidzakhala zikakwaniritsidwa, ndi ku Stanley kudzakhala kumakwaniritsidwa ndalama za m'maiko ena ndi dola za Mtsogoleri wa Mtsogoleri.

en: On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method.
ny: Pa mizinda yamphamvu, mabulukidwe a kareti sangathe kukhala akhulupirira, komanso ndalama za Bulemani ndi United States zingathe kuthandizidwa; chonde, chitani ntchito ndi anthu a m'manja mwa nthawi kuti muyenera kudziwa chiyani ndi chidziwitso chabwino cha kulipira.

en: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
ny: Kukhala ndi chidwi chokhazikika kusintha ndalama za Falklands pa nkhani ya m'maiko ena, chifukwa chake sintha ndalama ngati ukapita ku m'maiko ena.

en: Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa.
ny: Chifukwa chake Montevideo ndi pa m'mawa pa Mwala, ndipo ndi m'modzi mwa m'mawa pa dziko la m'mawa pamene ndi m'mawa pa dziko la m'mawa ku dziko la m'mawa ndipo ndi m'modzi mwa m'mawa pa dziko la m'mawa.

en: Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common.
ny: Montevideo ndi m'maiko a m'manja-m'manja; m'mwezi wa masika, zaka zosatha zikukhala zosatha +30°C.

en: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.
ny: Mphika yabwino ikhoza kuyimba: mafupi si akukhala pansi pa kugwa, koma mawu ndi kusamuka kwa mafuta amene akuphunzira kuti akhale wamphamvu kuposa chilichonse chimene chikuchitika.

en: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
ny: Palibe masiku "a mvula" ndi "a chilengedwe": kusintha kwa mvula kumakhala kuchokera m'mwaka m'mwaka.

en: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed.
ny: Ngati zingati zokha za m'manja ndi masewera a m'munda ndi amene amapita kuona anthu, koma zilengedwa zokha ndi zilengedwa ndipo saletsa kugwiritsa ntchito kapena kusankha.

en: According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals!
ny: Mwa anthu a munda, khalani kuchokera 100 mita kuchokera kwa nyama zosiyanasiyana ndi mbuzi ndi mbuzi ndi 25 mita kuchokera kwa nyama zosiyanasiyana zina zonse zosiyanasiyana!

en: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.
ny: Poyamba chifukwa chiyani amene akuchita kukhala ndi mtima wawo, bison, elk, moose, bears, ndi zonse zina zazikulu zimene zingathe kuchita kugwira ntchito.

en: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.
ny: Kumadzi, zaka zonse, anthu ochuluka amakhala ndi zochitika zambiri chifukwa sanachite kugwiritsa ntchito zochitika zambiri. Anthu amenewa ndi anthu ochuluka, ochokera ku dziko lalikulu, ndipo akhoza kugwiritsa ntchito zochitika zambiri, kotero mukawagwiritsa ntchito.

en: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
ny: Pambuyo pake, chonde mukhale ndi mtima wokhala kuti mafuta amapangitsa kumanga mbalame ndi zina zowononga, chonde lindani kusungidwa kapena kupika zochititsa mtima ndi kusintha kampi.

en: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.
ny: Apia ndi dziko la kapitali la Samoa. Mzinda ulipo pa dziko la Upolu ndi wanthu opanda zaka zingapo 40,000.

en: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
ny: Apia anapangidwa m'ma 1850s ndipo ndi boma la kapolo la Samoa kuyambira 1959.

en: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.
ny: Mwambapa wakhala ndi mawu a mpingo wokhala ndi mwayi mwa 1889 pamene mafotokozera awiri kuchokera ku Ujerumani, Mwambapa, ndi Uingereza sanayambe kuwachotsa mwa mpingo.

en: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.
ny: Zonse zimenezi zinali zokhazokha, koma chifukwa chake chikolola cha Britain chimodzi. Zaka zokoma 200 za anthu wa America ndi Germany zinapitilira.

en: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
ny: Pa nthawi ya kudzaza chisankho chomwe chidzakhazikike ndi Mau, chisankho chachikulu mu mzinda chidzachitikira ndi kumangidwa kwa mfumu yamakono Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.

en: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.
ny: Kumakhala mitsinje yambiri, chifukwa cha kugwirizana kwa Auckland pa mizinda yamitundu yamitatu. Yabwino zambiri zili m'mizinda yathu.

en: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.
ny: Nyanja za North Shore (m'mpingo wa North Harbour) zili pa Dziko la Pacific ndipo zimachitika kuchokera ku Long Bay kuchokera ku m'mwera mpaka ku Devonport.

en: They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees.
ny: Iwo ndi m'malo m'malo onse amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene amakhala ndi m'malawi amene

en: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.
ny: Mitundu ya Tamaki Drive ali ndi m'manja mwa Waitemata Harbour, m'mitundu yamakono a Mission Bay ndi St Heliers m'mmudzi waku Central Auckland.

en: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
ny: Izi ndi m'ma beach a m'modzi-modzi a m'mudzi wa m'mudzi ndi m'ma shop a bwino akumanga m'ma beach. Kugwira ntchito ndi chilungamo.

en: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
ny: Chibuku chachikulu cha m'mudzi ndi 'Number One', sili mowa wokhala wokhala, koma wachikondi ndi wosangalatsa. Mowa wina wokhala m'mudzi ndi "Manta".

en: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.
ny: Kuli zambiri zikugwiritsidwa ntchito vinyo vya Ufaransa, koma vinyo vya New Zealand ndi Australia vimakhala bwerere bwino.

en: The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful.
ny: Maji a m'manja a m'manja amachititsa chilichonse kudya, koma maji a m'manja amayi ndi achilichonse amayi kupanga kuchitira akudziwa.

en: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
ny: Kwa anthu a Australia, kusintha kwa kafuni ya 'flat white' ndi chilichonse. Kafuni yotchedwa ndi 'espresso', kafuni ya cappuccino ikuyenda ndi kudzaza ndi chikopa (sindikudzaza), ndi chayi yomwe ikuyenera kudzera ndi mafuta.

en: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
ny: Chikoko chachikondi chikumakwera mwa malamulo a Belgi. Mafuta a m'manja ndi amakonda koma amakonda.

en: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.
ny: Zaka zambiri zimakhala zikugwirizana ndi kugwira ntchito ku munda wa munda, ndipo ziwawa zofunikira kuchokera munda wa munda ndi ziwawa zosowa.

en: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
ny: Koma, pitirizani chithandizo kwa anthu oyenera, tchulani mabodza onse, ndi chonde tchulani mawu a chilolezo cha kugwira ntchito ndi kudziwa kwa chilolezo cha kugwira ntchito.

en: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.
ny: Mafuta a jellyfish amapitilira pa mabedi ndi pa m'manja wa mitundu ya m'manja kuchokera pa Mwezi wa October mpaka Mwezi wa April kumwamba kwa 1770. Koma zimenezi zingathe kuchitika pamene pali nthawi zina.

en: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.
ny: Mafuwa amayipo, koma amakhala osapanga chilungamo anthu. Mafuwa ambiri amakhulupirika ndi anthu ndipo amakhala akupita.

en: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.
ny: Mafisi a m'manja osalola ku m'dzi, koma dziko lawo lalikulu ndi m'manja a mitundu yakuwiri kuchokera ku Rockhampton.

en: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
ny: Kukweza pa nthawi yomweyo kumapereka mtima wokhulupirira wokhala kuti azakhale ndi kusintha kumene akufikira ku nthawi yomweyo.

en: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
ny: Agalati a kusafiri amakhala ndi mabokosi a maphunziro a maphunziro a maphunziro a maphunziro, komanso mukhoza kuyembekeza kuti mukhoza kuyembekeza zina za kusankha zina zina zina, monga mabwalo a kusankha, kupita kwa agalati a kusafiri.

en: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
ny: Agenzi za kusafiri zokha zimakhala zikapereka mabokosi amene amalola zokhala ndi zokhala, zokhala zokhala zokhala ndi zokhala zokhala kapena zokhala zokhala ndi zokhala zokhala ndi zokhala zokhala.

en: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).
ny: Iwo angathe kukhala ndi chithandizo chokhazikika chifukwa cha iwe ngati ukufuna nthawi yochita manyazi mokweza mawu kapena kusankha zina zina zomwe zidzakupatsa mawu (mumakonda visa).

en: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
ny: Zofunika kuchotsa kapena kutsimikizira koma zikhale zikuchokera kwa agenti wamafunso kwanu ndipo osakhala mochedwa ndi hoteli.

en: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
ny: Pa zofunika zambiri, anthu ambiri a kuwononga zofunika za muziki amadziwa kukhala pa mpando, ndipo anthu ambiri amadziwa kuti ndi chidziwitso chokhala pa mpando.

en: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
ny: Ngati mukufuna kuyenda ndi kusintha, mukufuna kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuyenda ndi kusintha kuy

en: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
ny: Kumbukirani kuti ngati muzikoyo pa mabokosi akulu akulu yafika pa mwazi, pali zochitika zazaka zomwe zidzachita kuyimba muziki mpaka mawa usiku.

en: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
ny: Zokhazokha zingaonongeka ndi malo a kampu yomweyo kwa anthu ochokera m'mawa amene ali ndi ana ochokera m'zaka zochepa.

en: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
ny: Ngati mukupita pa mtsinje wa Baltiki wa kumtunda, chonde onani dziko la kabini, chifukwa kusintha m'maso kumapanga zinthu zosavuta kwambiri kwa anthu omwe akukhala ndi ntchito.

en: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
ny: Ziwereka za Saint Petersburg zimayamba ndi nthawi mu mzinda. Abale a ziwereka amalakwitsidwa kufulumira za visa (chekani mafunso).

en: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
ny: Makasino amapanga zambiri kuti azidziwika ndi kugwiritsa ntchito nthawi ndi ndalama zomwe anthu amagwiritsa ntchito. Mabukhu ndi masiku amapangidwa kuti asiyire, ndipo zokhala zimakhala zofunikira.

en: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.
ny: Iwo amadalitsa zochita zosavuta, zomwa ndi zofunika, kuti azikonzekera anthu a m'modzi mwa zochita, ndipo azikonzekera ku dziko.

en: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
ny: Zinthu zambiri zimakhala ndi zinthu zomwe zimapereka zinthu zokoma za mowa. Koma, kusowa kwa nkhawa kumapanga kusintha chikhalidwe, ndipo onse amene amakhala ndi nzeru zokamba zokamba amadziwa chifukwa cha kusintha kwa nkhawa.

en: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
ny: Aliyense amene adzakhala akugwira pa mphamvu zosatha kapena pa maboma amakwera adzidziwa kukhala ndi chilengedwe cha chikondi, chitetezo kapena mafupi a kugwira ntchito.

en: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
ny: Pa mitsinje yomwe ndi yopanda mafuta ndi yomwe yomwe yomwe, kusintha ndi wokhala ngati mukukhala pa asifoti yopanda mafuta.

en: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.
ny: Pamaso pa kubwera kwa mafu, mafu ake okha okha angapite kuti ukhale ndi chilengedwe chokhala.

en: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.

en: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
ny: Zinthu za safaris ndi zofunikira kwambiri m'malawi ndi chidziwitso chokhudza ambiri a anthu.

en: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
ny: Ntchito ya safari yomwe imakhazikitsidwa ndi anthu ambiri imakhala yofika ku mafunso a dziko la Afirika kuti aone dziko lomwe likukhazikika ndi malamulo a dziko la Afirika, m'malo motero pa dziko la savanna.

en: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
ny: Zinthu zambiri, monga mbalame ndi nkhosa, zimakhala ndi chikondi chokwana kwa magalimoto ndi zinthu zina zokwanira zidzakuthandizani kuona bwino.

en: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
ny: Nsomba, nyamapango ndi mbewa amakhala ndi mphamvu yowawa ndipo mudzawona nawo bwino ndi zinthu zokhazokha.

en: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
ny: Njira yowonjezera (yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yomweyo yom

en: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
ny: Makasitomala a Paralympics adzakhala pa 24 Agasti mpaka 5 September 2021. Zinthu zina zidzakhala zikuchitika m'malo motere m'malo mwa Japan.

en: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.
ny: Tokyo idzakhala ndi dziko la Asia lomwe lidakonzedwa mpira wa Olimpiki zaka ziwiri, lomwe lidakonzedwa mpira mwa 1964.

en: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
ny: Ngati munayendetsa ndege zanu ndi kukhala ndi makampani anu pa 2020 ngati pali kusintha kwa tsiku lomwe anayankhula, mungathe kukhala ndi chilichonse chofunika.

en: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
ny: Zopangidwa zosungira zimakhala zofanana, koma kuchokera pa mwezi wa March wopatsa mwayi, zopangidwa zosungira zopangidwa zosungira zomwe zimakhala zosungira zofanana sizikuyendera mpaka mwezi wa July 2020, pamene mpira wa Olimpiki unapangidwa.

en: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
ny: Zikuyenera kuti tikiti ta msonkhano ambiri tizikwera pa ¥2,500 ndi ¥130,000, ndi tikiti zofanana zikuyenera kuti zikwera pa ¥7,000.

en: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
ny: Kusamba mafuta a m'manja kumayenera kusintha. Mabuku ambiri akumakhala ndi mafuta a m'manja ndi mbale yomwe ikhoza kusintha, ngakhale kuti palibe yomwe ikumalowa mu dzina.

en: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
ny: Ngati chikumbutso sichili chokwanira, kapena ngati simukufuna kuvaa zisokosi zokumbutswa, mukhoza kudzidzira kuti mukhale mukugwira ntchito hairdryer, ngati chikho chikukhala chokwanira.

en: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
ny: Chonde musiyeni kuti mafaburiki asawonekereko kwambiri (ngati zingathe kusintha, kapena m'madziro a chilichonse).

en: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
ny: Kumakhala ndi njira zambiri za kusintha madzi, zina zokonzeka zambiri pa mavuto amene akuchitika.

en: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
ny: Mu maiko ena kuyambira kusintha madzi pa nthawi imodzi ndi yabwino, koma mu maiko ena zingapo madzi ambiri amachitika.

en: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
ny: Mafilita amakhala ndi mphamvu zokhazikika, ndipo ngati muli ndi chilungamo, ndipo mukufuna kudziwa, ndipo mukufuna kugula madzi anu m'mbomba yomwe imakhala yachilungamo kuchokera kumpana wabwino.

en: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
ny: Abalemera amayenera kukhala ndi ziweto zokhazokha zomwe sadziwike m'malo awo a ku nyumba.

en: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
ny: Nzoka zingakonze chakudya, zikachititsa manyazi, kapena m'malo motero zingachititse kupanga manyazi, kusambaza chikondi, kapena kupanga kusambaza zinthu zokhala ndi maganizo.

en: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
ny: Zaulembe zolimba zimenezi, kapena ziwiri zofunikira kuti zikhale zikuchitika kapena ziwiri zofunikira kuti zikhale zikuchitika kapena kuchita anthu kukhala ndi mphamvu, sizikufunika kuti zikhale zikuchitika.

en: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
ny: Kugula zinthu pa duty free ndi chithandizo cha kugula zinthu zomwe sizikweza malipiro ndi zonyoza pa malo amene akupitilira.

en: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
ny: Abale omwe akuyenda ku dziko ndi mabwana amene akugwiritsa ntchito zokweza ndalama zambiri, monga mafuta a mowa ndi tabako, akhoza kukhala ndi ndalama zambiri, ngati akufuna kugula zimenezi.

en: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
ny: Ntchito yomwe yalipo pakati pa Point Marion ndi Fairmont ndi yomwe yabwino kuyendetsa mafunso pa Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, yomwe ikuyenda kwa tsiku ndi tsiku pa dziko la malo a m'manja.

en: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
ny: Ngati simukufuna kuyenda pa mitsinje yam'mudzi, chonde mukhale ndi makolo anu: mabvuto amlomo, mizere yochepa, ndi mizere yomwe yalakwika.

en: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
ny: Mawu akuposted a mphamvu zimakhala zosowa kuchokera kumene zinali kale ndi zina zina — koma ngati mphamvu 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — ndi kusintha kwa iwo ndi chifukwa chake kwa mphamvu.

en: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ny: Chifukwa chake, mwayi wa mafoni a m'manja ndi wokhazikika kuposa m'manja amodzi mwa mawu a njira, monga Pennsylvania Wilds.

en: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
ny: Mapiritsi a Germany ndi opambana kwambiri, ndipo mu Bavaria, ndi opambana kwambiri ndi opanda mwayi, monga omwe akumwera kwa iwo, Austria.

en: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
ny: Makina a mafuta a m'manja ndi amene amachitika, ndi mafuta a mapulayi akugwiritsidwa m'manja mwa masiku onse a mwaka, ndi mafuta a mazere ndi mafuta a masele akupita kuwoneka pa masika.

en: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
ny: Zambiri zomwe zimachitika ku Germany zimakhala ndi mafuta a mthiko, mafuta a kanyenyezi ndi zina zonyamula zina. Mabuku ochuluka amapangidwa ndi kusintha kwambiri ndi kafukufuku wamphamvu.

en: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ny: Ngati mukufuna zinthu zosiyanasiyana koma zokoma zambiri, onani zimene zikuyenera kuchitika monga Berliner, Pfannkuchen kapena Krapfen m'makono.

en: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
ny: Kari ndi chakudya chomwe chikuyenera kupangidwa ndi zitetezi ndi mapiripiri, pamodzi ndi nyama kapena mbewu.

en: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
ny: Kariyo kungakhale "wotete" kapena "wotete" monga zikhala zimenezi zikhala zokhala.

en: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
ny: Mu m'mudzi wakale wa Kaskazini mwa India ndi Pakistan, mchuzi wa mtindi ukugwiritsidwa ntchito kwa kawiri; mu m'mudzi wa Kusini mwa India ndi m'mudzi wina wakale wa m'mudzi wa nyanja wa subcontinent, mafuta a kokonati akugwiritsidwa ntchito kwa kawiri.

en: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
ny: Ndikukhulupirira ndi 17,000 mizinda yomwe inapangidwa, chakudya cha Indonesia ndi chilango chokhala chifukwa cha zinthu zambiri za maphunziro a m'malawi amene amapangidwa m'malawi.

en: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
ny: Koma, ngati ikhazikitsidwa pa nkhani zina, tsatanetsatane yachitetezo yomweyo ikufuna kudziwa chakudya chomwe chachokera ku dziko lachikulu la Java.

en: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ny: Tsopano yomwe yachitikira m'malo m'malo, chakudya cha Javanese chimakhala ndi zinthu zambiri zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zomwe zimakhala zom

en: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
ny: Zikolowa ndi maudzu a wakumalipilo amene amapangidwa kwa wakumalipilo amene amapangidwa pa m'mtundu wamkulu.

en: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
ny: Iwo amapereka chikhalidwe chokonzeka kwa wosuta koma chikhulupiriro chachitetezo chifukwa cha kuchitika kwa mafupa a wosuta m'mene amagwiritsa ntchito.

en: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
ny: Ngati mtsogoleri akugwiritsidwa mwayi ndi mphavu koma akukhala ndi mtengo wokhala wosowa, akhoza kugwiridwa ngati mphavu ikapita. Kuti kugwiritsa ntchito mwayi uyu, zinthu zambiri zokhala ndi mphamvu zimene zingakhale zimachitika.

en: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
ny: Pansi pano, anthu ambiri amagula ma boots a ku gulu ndi mphamvu ndi m'manja omwe uli wachinsinsi, pogwiritsa ntchito.

en: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
ny: Pano, zinthu zina zokhala zikukhala zomwe, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusintha zikusintha, zikusin

en: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
ny: Kuona Cochamó Valley - mtsogoleri wokhala wa Chile, woyenera kuchita kugwira ntchito, woyenera kuchita kugwira ntchito, wokhala wa Yosemite wa Afrika yam'merika, ndi mafupa a granite awo ndi mafupa.

en: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
ny: Maphunziro akuchokera ku mpingo ukudziwa ndi mawu a kusintha m'mpingo. Abale a maphunziro kuchokera ku dziko lonse lapansi akuchita kuyika mitundu yatsopano pa mpingo wathu wamphamvu.

en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
ny: Kusintha kwa mafuta a m'manja, amene amathandiza kugwira ntchito za kusintha ndi kugwira ntchito za mafuta a m'manja, ndi ntchito zoyenera zomwe zimathandiza kugwira ntchito za kusintha mafuta a m'manja kapena mafuta a m'manja amapangidwa kwa m'manja mwako.

en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
ny: Kusokoneza ndi chikhalidwe chachikulu cha kusafiri ndi anthu ambiri amene amapangira zaka zonse zosafuna kusokoneza pa nthawi zina, omwe amakhala akuchita kupanga zokhala zonse pa kusokoneza m'malo motero.

en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
ny: Cholinga cha kuski ndi chachikulu kwambiri - mafano a m'mbale zomwe amapangitsa anthu kuski akudzakhala kuchokera pa 5000 BC!

en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ny: Kusokoneza mpira wa ski kumapita kwa zaka za 17, ndipo mu 1861 chigwirizano cha ski chachitikira chakumapereka chifukwa cha anthu a Norway mu Australia.

en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
ny: Kuphulika ndi ski: Mau ake ndi kugwiritsa ntchito ski m'madera, kugwiritsa ntchito ski kapena kugwiritsa ntchito ski.

en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
ny: Ili ndi chidziwitso koma osakhazikitsa kugwiritsa ntchito zokhala ndi kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwiritsa ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena kugwira ntchito m'maiko a m'manja kapena k

en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
ny: Chifukwa njira ya kusimuka ngati njira yosamuka yosamuka.

en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ny: Mwachita kukhala ndi mwayi, mudzakhala mukhoza kusungira masiku okha kuposa kusamba - koma choncho ndi zofunikira kukhala ndi mphamvu zambiri zokhala ndi mafupi kumene mukugwira ntchito yowonjezera.

en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
ny: Europe ndi dziko lalikulu komanso ndi dziko lalikulu, koma ndi dziko lalikulu ndi dziko lalikulu. Pa nthawi zokwanira, kuyenda pa dziko lalikulu ndi dziko lalikulu kudzakhala ndi kusankha visa ndi kudzera pasipoti kudzakhala ndi nthawi zambiri.

en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
ny: Zonse za Schengen, koma, zikuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito monga dziko limodzi m'malo muno.

en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
ny: Poyamba mukhale mu zone imeneyi, mungathe kuyenda m'mitundu yomweyo ndikumapita m'misokho ya kusintha pasipoti.

en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
ny: Pamene, mwa kugwiritsa ntchito visa ya Schengen, simukufuna kukhala ndi visa kwa dziko lonse la Schengen m'modzi m'modzi, chifukwa chake kusinthana ndi nthawi, ndalama ndi kugwira ntchito.

en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
ny: Palibe chitseko cha dziko lonse kuti zinthu zomwe zidzachitidwe ndi zofunikira. Zinthu zambiri za msonkhano zimayenera kuti zikhale zofunikira kuposa 100 ndi za antiques.

en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
ny: Nthano yomweyo ili ndi zofanana za dziko, kuti mphamvu ya nthawi imakhala yoposa m'ma dziko ngati North America kuposa Europe.

en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
ny: Zinthu zazinthu zingathe kusintha ngati zikuyenera kuchitidwa ngati zikulu zina zomwe zinachitidwa pamodzi.

en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
ny: Kusamala kwa mbuzi wa kusafirisha ni chikondi chachikulu mwa Sámi ndi chikumbumtima chachikulu chomwe chikukhala chachikulu ndi anthu ena omwe ali ndi ntchito zina.

en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
ny: Ngati kumene, koma osati onse a Sámi anayamba kuyenera kuwoneka mu ufulu wokhala ndi ntchito yoyamba ya mafuta, koma anayamba kuyenda ndi kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, kuchokera kuwononga, kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, koma anayamba kuyenda ndi kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, kuchokera kuwononga, kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, kugwira ntchito zina zofanana ndi kugwira ntchito, kugwira ntchito zina z

en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
ny: Lero ndi anthu ambiri a Sámi akugwiritsa ntchito mu mabizinesi a tsopano. Kuwona ndi chuma chachikulu mu Sápmi, dziko la anthu a Sámi.

en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
ny: Ngakhale kuti ili ndi chilengedwe chokwanira, monga kwa anthu osalakwa a Romani, mawu "Gypsy" amaperekedwa ngati mawu a chidzimayi chifukwa cha kusintha kwambiri ndi chilimbikitso cha anthu a Romani.

en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
ny: Ngati dziko lomwe mungakapeze kumakwera likhala ndi chilolezo cha kusafiri, chilolezo chanu cha kusafiri kapena chilolezo chanu cha kusintha mwayi mungakhalenso ndi chilengedwe.

en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
ny: Mungafune kukhala ndi mawu a mabungwe ena ngati zinthu zina zomwe zikukhuzidwa ndi anthu awo, koma mawu awo akukhuzidwa ndi anthu awo.

en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
ny: Mwa nthawi yomweyo, anthu a America ku Mtsinje wa M'mtima amayenera kukhala ndi zinthu zina zoposa anthu a Europe kapena Arabu.

en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
ny: Zokambilila ndi mawu osiyanasiyana opanga kusintha ntchito ya maphunziro a chisiasa m'mdziko mmodzi.

en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ny: Mawu akupatsidwa ndi maphunziro amatha kusintha, kusintha ndi kuthetsa monga kusintha kwa maphunziro ake omwe amapezeka m'malo motero.

en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
ny: Mphamvu yoyamba ndi chithunzi chokwanira cha chilengedwe chowawa chomwe chingathe kupanga chilengedwe, chilengedwe chokhazikika cha maphunziro a anthu, kapena kupititsa m'mtima anthu.

en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
ny: Mawu akuchitika m'malo motero m'nyumba yonse pa dziko lonse, ndipo kuli zinthu zina zake, zimene zingathe kuchitike monga zikugwiritsidwa ntchito ndi kugwiritsa ntchito nkhondo, topografi, ndi zinthu za chikhalidwe cha dziko.

en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
ny: Mphamvu zoyamba, mafuta, kusintha kwakukula kwa mvula, ndi mafuta a moto ndi zofunikira za chilengedwe chachikulu cha nthawi yabwino, ngati zomwe ndi zofunikira za mvula, zomwe zikuyamba, zomwe zikuyamba, zomwe zikuyamba, ndi zomwe zikuyamba.

en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
ny: Za masiku ndi masiku, zinthu zofunikira zochita zokhazokha zimakhala kumwamba ndi kumwera, m'mene zikuchitika ndi blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, ndi dust storms.

en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
ny: Abale a maphunziro amakondwera kwambiri kuti akhale ndi chifukwa chokhazikika cha nthawi yoyamba yomwe ikhoza kugwiritsa ntchito maphunziro awo ponse ponse ngati zikhala zikugwiritsa ntchito maphunziro awo.

en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
ny: Aliyense amene akufuna kuyenda ku dziko lomwe lingathe kuchititsa manyazi, amapereka maphunziro a wofunika.

en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
ny: Kukhazikika pa Intaneti kwa 'Kholo la m'manja wosavuta' kungatulutsa chithandizo cha kampeni yomweyi yam'manja wosavuta.

en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
ny: Mtsogolo yemweyo ndi wopambana udzakhala wosankha zonse zomwe zili pano ndi zambiri zambiri, koma ndi chifukwa chake ndi chilengedwe chokhala ndi mphamvu zambiri, koma ndi chifukwa chake ndi chilengedwe chokhala ndi mphamvu zambiri, ndi zosankha zambiri.

en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
ny: Mkangano wosiyana ndi masiku 2-5 ndi wosiyana ndi kusintha mawu, kusintha kwa chithandizo chachikulu ndi kusiyana ndi kusintha mawu.

en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
ny: Mabuku ndi magazini omwe amakhala akuchita kukhala ndi mwayi wa kuchita kukhala m'manja mwa dziko lalikulu ndi anjira za mwayi wa kuchita kukhala akuchuluka. Koma mabuku ndi magazini omwe amakhala akuchita kukhala ndi mwayi wa kuchita kukhala m'manja mwa dziko la chitukuko ndi amodzi.

en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
ny: Abalezi akupangira chikondi cha kusintha m'malo m'malowa amalonda amene ali ku dziko lina amafuna kusintha zithu zokhala ndi zidziwitso zofunikira kwa tsiku la kuyenda kwawo.

en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
ny: Kusintha kwa mafumu kupeza pasipoti yomweyo yomweyo ndi gulu lomwe limakhala silinayimbidwe (X) kapena mafayilo amapangidwa kuti akhale ndi dzina ndi gulu limene limakhala silinayimbidwe lili ndi zaka zimene zimatha.

en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.

en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.

en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.

en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.

en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
ny: Mafirimu amapereka ndalama zambiri kwa kuyendetsa zinthu mwa tsiku lomwe. Pamaso pa nthawi, nthawi yabwino ndi yabwino ndi maudindo a bizinesi, zinthu zakupezeka kapena zinthu zokwanira kwa tsamba la kusintha.

en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.

en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.

en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.

en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
