en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
ny: Kapitali ya Moldova ndi Chişinău. Chilankhulo cha anthu a m'mudzi ndi Romanian, koma Russian ndi chilichonse chokhazikika.

en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
ny: Moldova ndi dziko lalikulu la anthu ochepa amene limakonda kugwira ntchito ndi chitukuko cha anthu ochepa.

en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
ny: Mwaka wa 1994, mzozo unoledza kuuluka kwa kusankhidwa kwa Dziko la Transnistria lomwe lili ku dziko la Moldova la kuwonjezera, lomwe lili ndi dziko lake lalikulu ndi ndalama zake, koma silili likudziwa ndi dziko lalikulu la UN.

en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
ny: Mipando yamakono yalakwika kusintha kwa mabungwe awiri a Moldova ngati pali chinsinsi m'maule a maphunziro.

en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
ny: Makolo a m'madera a Moldova ndi Khristu wa Orthodox.

en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
ny: İzmir ndi mzinda watsopano wapansi mwa Turki ndi anthu okhaokha 3.7 miliyoni, ndi mtsinje watsopano wapansi pamaso pa Istanbul, ndi mtsinje wabwino wosavuta.

en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
ny: Pambuyo pa mtsinje wokondwera, Smyrna yomwe yayikulu, yakhala ngati dera la m'manja, ndi tsopano ngati dera la m'manja, yomwe yakhala ndi ntchito zambiri, ndi ndi kumanga ndi m'maiko.

en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ny: Mabulodi a mabulodi, maboma a maboma a gleso ndi maboma a kugulitsa a tsopano amapangidwa ndi mavuta a chikale, m'paka maboma a 18th century, ndi masjid ndi mitsinje yachipembedzo, komanso mpingo wa kale, komanso dziko likuyenda ndi mphamvu yowonjezera ya Ulaya wa Mediteranea kuposa Turkey yachipembedzo.

en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
ny: Mphakati wa Haldarsvík ukupereka mawonekedwe a dziko lalikulu la Eysturoy ndi kugwirizana ndi mpingo wamphamvu wamphamvu.

en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
ny: Mu dziko la mpingo, kuli zinthu zogwirizana zokoma za mabvuto pamapeto ena.

en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
ny: Ndi zochita zingapo ndi nkhani ya nthawi yachaka kuti uzilira mu mtsinje wam'mphika wamphamvu.

en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
ny: Ku nthawi ya kumwamba ndi ndi kudzera ndi kusintha, kuli m'mbali ya kumwamba ndi kumapita ndi m'mbali yabwino ya Sintra yabwino ndi yabwino yabwino, yomwe yayamba kumapangitsa anthu a m'malawi pa chisomo chake chachikulu chomwe anaperekedwa ndi Lord Byron.

en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
ny: Basimu ya Scotturb Bus 403 ikatsika kuchoka ku Sintra, ikasimikira ku Cabo da Roca.

en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
ny: Pambuyo pambuyo, tembenukire ku Mtsogoleri Wathu wa Fatima (Mtsogolo), dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Kristu, dziko la mawu a Yesu Krist

en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
ny: Chonde mukumbuke kuti mwalephera kuyenda ku nyumba yowawa, ngati pali nyumba yowawa yomwe ili ndi chilichonse, ndipo yomwe ili ndi chilichonse chimakhala ndi chilichonse chokhudza kwa anthu ambiri ku dziko lonse lapansi.

en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
ny: Kumakhala ambiri ndi anthu amuna ndi akazi amene amadalira nthawi yawo pano, ndi ambiri amene anakhudza amuna awo kapena anthu amene anaphedwa kapena anapanga ntchito yowawa, amayi ndi azibale, amene anaphedwa kapena anapanga ntchito yowawa, akumakhala anthu a Yuda ndi anthu osalakwa.

en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
ny: Chonde, mukhulupirire mtsinje ndi mphamvu zonse zomwe zimafunika. Musakambire zopusa za Holocaust kapena Nazi.

en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
ny: Musatengelele m'dzina ndi kugwetsa mafuta kapena kugwetsa mafuta m'ma stractures.

en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
ny: Zilango za Barcelona ndi zilankhulo zake zoyenera Catalan ndi Spanish. Zambiri zokha amafuna kuyankhula Catalan, koma anthu ambiri amafuna, ndipo zonse zikudziwa Spanish.

en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
ny: Koma, mafunso ambiri amapangidwa ndi Chikatalani chifukwa chake ndi chilankhulo chofanana ndi chilankhulo cha ofesi yomwe ili ndi chilankhulo chachikulu.

en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
ny: Koma, pa malo a umphawi wa umphawi wa umphawi ndi zina zambiri zili zofunika.

en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ny: Mau ake ake a mawu a Metro akuyenera kuchitidwa m'mbiri mwa Chikatalani, koma zinthu zosamvetsa zimachitidwa ndi mfundo yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yomweyi yom

en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
ny: Aba Parisians ali ndi chikondi cha kusowa mtima, kusowa chisoni ndi kusowa chisoni.

en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
ny: Pamene izi ndi zofunika zambiri, njira yabwino yochitira bwino mu Paris ndi yoti kukhala ndi mwayi wabwino, kuchita ngati munthu amene ali "bien élevé" (ali ndi mwayi wabwino). Izizipangitsa kusintha mwayi wabwino.

en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
ny: Kukhala okhala kwa anthu a Paris akhala kuwala kwambiri ngati ukhala ndi zinthu zosiyanasiyana zokhala ndi anthu.

en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
ny: Nkhungu ya Plitvice Lakes ndi yoyenera kusunga, koma ndi m'munda wokhala ndi m'mbawa, m'mbawa, ndi m'mbawa zina, ndi yofunikira m'mbawa ya Alpine ndi Mediterranean.

en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
ny: Ili ndi chidwi chokoma cha mizere yambiri, chifukwa cha mizere yake yamakono, mafupa ochokera ndi mizere yamakono yamakono ndi mizere yamakono yamakono.

en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
ny: M'mudzi uno pali zinthu zambiri zokhazokha zokhala ndi zolengedwa za nkhosa ndi nsomba.

en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ny: M'malo mowoneka zinthu zosiyanasiyana monga mbuzi ya m'malawi, mbuzi, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mbalame, mb

en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
ny: Pamene kumapita ku mitsinje, akazi amafunika kuvaya mapata a m'manja omwe amapereka m'manja ndi kuvaya m'manja awo.

en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
ny: Kukhala kwambiri kwa maboma ambiri akupereka zikwama kwa akazi amene akufika osapereka, koma ngati ukupereka wanu, monga mokwanira wokha ndi zikwama zokhala zokoma, udzapeza chisoni kwa mafumu kapena amai pa mtsinje.

en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
ny: Pa nthawi yomweyo, a mwamuna amafunika kuvaya mabukhu akugwira ntchito m'makoloko.

en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
ny: Izi ndi izi zingathe kuchita kukhala zokhazokha kuchokera pa stokiyi pa mtundu, koma ngati zimenezi zili ndi mavuto osati zimenezi zimachitidwa chifukwa cha munthu wokwanira, kotero simungakwanitse kuvaa mavuto awa. Mwambo wokhala wosavuta wokha kwa anthu onse!

en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
ny: Chakudya cha Majorcan, monga chakudya cha mizinda yosiyana m'mwambamo, chikuyenera kuchokera m'mphika, mbatata ndi nyama (chifukwa chake nyama ya nguruwe), ndipo chikuyenera kutumika mafuta a mthunzi ndi zonse.

en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
ny: Chakudya chachikulu chachikulu chachikulu, monga pa masomphenya, ndi Pa amb Oli: Mphasa ndi mafuta a mafuta, tamati, ndi zina zina zomwe zili zonse zomwe zili zonse monga chisoso, chikondi, ndi zina.

en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
ny: Zonse zidzidzimuka, pamodzi ndi mawu a Sie kwa iwe, zonse zidzakhala ndi mawu a kapitolo, ngati m'mtengowu wa mawu.

en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
ny: Iyi ndi njira yabwino yomwe ikufuna kusintha m'dziko la zinthu zina ndi zomwe.

en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
ny: Iyo ndi yopambana kuyambira kusoma, koma kuyamba ndi yofunika kuchita bwino kuti utenge kuti chiyankhulo kapena chikwama chitumike mwa fomu yake ya kusintha.

en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
ny: Kuphunzitsa ndi luso lomwe ndi loyera kwambiri m'maluso, chifukwa chosavuta kwambiri kwa maneno ambiri kuchokera m'maluso.

en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
ny: Mawu akulu okhala ndi kuchita bwino ndi c ndi g, chifukwa chake kusintha kwawo kwa mawu akulu kuchokera pa mawu akale.

en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
ny: Pemphani kuti mumvekele kuchita kuphunzira r ndi rr m'makhalidwe: caro ndi chifukwa chake, koma carro ndi chifukwa chake chariot.

en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
ny: Pershani ndi mafunso otsiriza ndi wokhazikika kwambiri.

en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
ny: Chifukwa chake, kusoma kwa chikwama cha kugwira ntchito chidzakusiyani kuchita kudziwa zambiri za kugwira ntchito ya Persian ndi kudziwa zambiri zambiri zambiri.

en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
ny: Chonde, ngati mukudziwa chilankhulo cha Romance, zitha kuyenda bwino kuti mukhala mukudziwa Chileno.

en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
ny: Koma, anthu amene akudziwa chilichonse cha Spanish chifukwa chake akhoza kusankha kuti Portuguese ndi wachinsinsi kwambiri chifukwa chake palibe chifukwa choti izikhala yosankha chifukwa chake.

en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
ny: Maboma a m'malo a kuchita kugwiritsa ntchito masiku ano ndi a m'malo a kugwiritsa ntchito, ndipo amakhala ngati muziyamu, kapena maboma a kusankha.

en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
ny: Ngati zokhoma zimenezi pa nthawi yawo yayitali sanali ndi chidwi chokhudza, zimakhala mu mzinda kapena ku ma campus, zokhoma kumakwera kuposa zimene zinachitidwa mu nthawi yathu.

en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ny: Mafashoni a maphunziro a tsiku lino ndi amodzi ndi zofunikira m'malo mokhala m'malire ambiri ndi zofunikira zokhala ndi mawu a malire.

en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
ny: Kuyenda kwa mpingo wachikondi, chifukwa cha hanami, kuchokera pa malamulo a Japan kuyambira tsiku la 8.

en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
ny: Cholinga chinali ndi China kuti mabvuto akhala ndi mabvuto amakhalanso m'mwera wa China.

en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
ny: M'malawi, mabuku achimalawi amapangidwa ndi mfumu yekha ndipo kwa anthu ena a m'malawi omwe ali ndi mphamvu ku m'malawi wa mfumu.

en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
ny: Mabungwe amakonda bwino kwambiri pamene ali m'mtundu wawo wokha, kotero usamangidwe ndi kusunga chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake chifukwa chake ch

en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
ny: Poyamba kukhala mu chipinda chomwe chinali chilengedwe, kugwiritsa ntchito "zinthu" ndikukupatsa kusintha, osamangobwera ndi chilungamo.

en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
ny: Singapore ndi dziko lalikulu kwambiri la kugwira ntchito ndi lalikulu kwambiri kuyendetsa, ndipo mukhoza kugula zonse zimene mukufika.

en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
ny: Koma kuchokera ku "tropics yoyamba" yomwe ili ndi mphamvu zambiri kuposa kusunga, mukufuna kukhulupirira ndi chilichonse (pamene mwayi ukuyenda, zambiri zambiri) ndi m'mphamvu yabwino (pamene mwezi ukuyenda, zambiri zambiri).

en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
ny: Pali ndi mabasi amodzi amene amapita kumwera ku Hebron, dziko lalikulu la kumwalira la abale a Bibulo Abrahamu, Isaki, Yakobo, ndi akazi awo.

en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
ny: Chonde chigwiritsire ntchito kuti basi lomwe mukufuna kuyenda limapita ku Hebron ndipo sili kwa chikhalidwe cha Yahudi chachikulu cha Kiryat Arba.

en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
ny: M'manja mwa madzi amene ali ndi mwayi, angathe kukhala mawu olimba wokhala ndi chitetezo chabwino pa tsiku la chisangalalo.

en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
ny: Mwachitsanzo, kuyenda ku makasitomu mu Lwayeri, m'makasitomu a Rhine kapena kuyenda ndi mafunso azipita m'makasitomu a Danube kapena kuyenda ndi mafunso azipita m'makasitomu a Erie.

en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
ny: Iwo amapangitsa maphunziro pa njira zazikulu za kuyenda ndi kugona.

en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
ny: Kholofelo ndi m'modzi mwa zida zosiyanasiyana zoyamba za Ukristu, ndipo ikhala yosangalatsa ngati tsiku la kuzaliwa kwa Yesu.

en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
ny: Zambiri mwa zinthu zomwe zikuyenera kuchitikira pa tsiku la tsiku linali zinachitikira ndi anthu osakhulupirika m'malo moti m'malawi a mpingo wa Khristu ndi anthu osakhulupirika pa dziko lonse lapansi.

en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
ny: Kumakhala ndi chilungamo kuti m'mawa wa Pasika tikhale ndi m'maso mwa chilengedwe chokhala ndi chikondi kuti tione kukhazikika kwa mawa.

en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
ny: Pali pano zili zonyadira za teoloji ya Khristu pa nkhaniyi, koma zingathe kuti ndi mtsogoleri wa m'makolo wa Chisimikizi ndi Chilimba cha Kusintha.

en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ny: Mipingo yambiri yamakristu amagwira ntchito chifukwa cha Vigil ya Pasika pa usiku wa Sabata pa weekend ya Pasika, ndi anthu a mipingo yomwe amagwira ntchito amakhalanso akukhala ndi chisomo pa nthawi ya kusintha pa usiku wa manja kuyambira pa mawu a m'midnight kuti asinthe kwa kufufuka kwa Khristu.

en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
ny: Zonse zilengedwa zomwe zinali m'maungo anadzafika pano ndi kuswimika, kuyenda ndi kusambuka.

en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
ny: Chifukwa cha nthawi yochuluka kwa dziko, mamalidi sanapange msinkhu wokwera, ndipo kuchepa kwa njoka yamakoma kuchita kusintha kwa nyama yomweyo kumene kumene kwa Galapagos.

en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
ny: Pamtunda pa munthu kwa Galapagos, zaka zambiri zinapitilizira ndi kuchotsa zinthu zambiri zokhala zomwe zinayambira kuchokera kwa mbuzi, m'manja, ng'ombe, mbeu, mbuzi ndi mbwa.

en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
ny: Ngati ukhala ku dziko la Arctic kapena Antarctic m'masika, udzakhala ndi usiku wa polar, yomwe ikunena kuti dzulo silikukhala m'mphamvu.

en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
ny: Izi ndi mphamvu yabwino yoti tizione Aurora borealis, chifukwa mwezi udzakhala wachinyengo koma kumapita.

en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ny: Chifukwa maboma akuyenda ndi anthu ochepa, ndipo chifukwa chake zokhazokha sizikuwoneka, ndipo mudzakhala ndi chikondi kwa zinthu.

en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
ny: Ulimi wa kazi wa Japan ndi wamkulu zaidi ndi wamakono zokwanira kuposa ena amene akhoza kuziwona.

en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
ny: Zikwati ndi zomwe zimakhala zokwanira pa ntchito, ndipo anthu a ntchito amagwirizana ndi zina za m'mudzi wawo kapena ndi zina za ntchito.

en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
ny: Kukhala ndi chikhulupiriro pa ntchito ndi cholinga chachikulu, kusintha chuma cha m'modzi koma kusintha ntchito ya m'modzi.

en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
ny: Akazi amafuna kuthandizidwa ndi anthu awo a kuwawa kwa maqonzi awo pa zonse zimene amachita, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zopanda pake zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amayenera kudziwa zomwe amagwira ntchito zao, ndipo amay
